16764025Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static decimal GetMilliSeconds(byte[] ntpTime)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    decimal intpart = 0, fractpart = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i <= 3; i++)Di2015NewLine        intpart = 256 * intpart + ntpTime[i];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 4; i <= 7; i++)Di2015NewLine        fractpart = 256 * fractpart + ntpTime[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var milliseconds = intpart * 1000 + ((fractpart * 1000) / 0x100000000L);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("milliseconds: " + milliseconds);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("intpart:      " + intpart);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("fractpart:    " + fractpart);Di2015NewLine    return milliseconds;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[] ConvertToNtp(decimal milliseconds)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    decimal intpart = 0, fractpart = 0;Di2015NewLine    var ntpData = new byte[8];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    intpart = milliseconds / 1000;Di2015NewLine    fractpart = ((milliseconds % 1000) * 0x100000000L) / 1000m;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("milliseconds: " + milliseconds);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("intpart:      " + intpart);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("fractpart:    " + fractpart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var temp = intpart;Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 3; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ntpData[i] = (byte)(temp % 256);Di2015NewLine        temp = temp / 256;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    temp = fractpart;Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 7; i >= 4; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ntpData[i] = (byte)(temp % 256);Di2015NewLine        temp = temp / 256;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ntpData;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = { 131, 170, 126, 128,Di2015NewLine           46, 197, 205, 234 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var ms = GetMilliSeconds(bytes);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    var ntp = ConvertToNtp(ms);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16767138Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach
16767138Di2015UniqueSeparatorArray.ForEach
16767138Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Benchmark(50);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Benchmark(int iterations)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[] list = Enumerable.Range(0, 100000000).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long sum = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sum += ArrayForeach(list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("ForEach " + sum / iterations);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sum = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < iterations; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sum += Foreach(list);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("foreach " + sum / iterations);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static long Foreach(int[] list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long total = 0;Di2015NewLine        var stopWatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var i in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            total += i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        stopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        return stopWatch.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static long ArrayForeach(int[] list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long total = 0;Di2015NewLine        var stopWatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        Array.ForEach(list, x => total += x);Di2015NewLine        stopWatch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        return stopWatch.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16768027Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the string of an DescriptionAttribute of an Enum.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value">The Enum value for which the description is needed.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>If a DescriptionAttribute is set it return the content of it.Di2015NewLine    /// Otherwise just the raw name as string.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string Description(this Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string description = value.ToString();Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo fieldInfo = value.GetType().GetField(description);Di2015NewLine        DescriptionAttribute[] attributes =Di2015NewLine           (DescriptionAttribute[])Di2015NewLine         fieldInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (attributes != null && attributes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            description = attributes[0].Description;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return description;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates an List with all keys and values of a given Enum classDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">Must be derived from class Enum!</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A list of KeyValuePair<Enum, string> with all availableDi2015NewLine    /// names and values of the given Enum.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static IList<KeyValuePair<Enum, string>> ToList<T>() where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!type.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("T must be an enum");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (IList<KeyValuePair<Enum, string>>)Di2015NewLine                Enum.GetValues(type)Di2015NewLine                    .OfType<Enum>()Di2015NewLine                    .Select(e => new KeyValuePair<Enum, string>(e, e.Description()))Di2015NewLine                    .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T GetValueFromDescription<T>(string description) where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(!type.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("T must be an enum");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(var field in type.GetFields())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attribute = Attribute.GetCustomAttribute(field,Di2015NewLine                typeof(DescriptionAttribute)) as DescriptionAttribute;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(attribute != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(attribute.Description == description)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return (T)field.GetValue(null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(field.Name == description)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return (T)field.GetValue(null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("description");Di2015NewLine        // or return default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16781629Di2015UniqueSeparatorEventWaitHandle event = new EventWaitHandle(true, Di2015NewLine     EventResetMode.ManualReset, Di2015NewLine     strEventGlobalName,     //Must be the same for each processDi2015NewLine     out dummy, Di2015NewLine     eventSecurity);         //To allow access between processesDi2015NewLine
16781629Di2015UniqueSeparator//Process 1Di2015NewLine//High frequency "writes"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Wait to allow writingDi2015NewLineif (event.WaitOne(System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mutex.WaitOne(System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Do write operationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mutex.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(AbandonedMutexException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Log errorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16781629Di2015UniqueSeparator//Process 2Di2015NewLine//Low frequency "reads"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Reset event to halt writingDi2015NewLine    if (!event.Reset())Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Did not reset event");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mutex.WaitOne(System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Do read operationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            mutex.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(AbandonedMutexException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Log errorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefinallyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Set event to allow back writingDi2015NewLine    if(!event.Set())Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Did not set event");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16782244Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.ServiceBus;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.WindowsAzure;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.WindowsAzure.ServiceRuntime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WorkerRoleWithSBQueue1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class WorkerRole : RoleEntryPointDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The name of your queueDi2015NewLine        const string QueueName = "QUEUE_NAME";Di2015NewLine        const int MaxThreads = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // QueueClient is thread-safe. Recommended that you cache Di2015NewLine        // rather than recreating it on every requestDi2015NewLine        QueueClient Client;Di2015NewLine        bool IsStopped;Di2015NewLine        int dequeueRequests = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void Run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!IsStopped)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Increment Request CounterDi2015NewLine                Interlocked.Increment(ref dequeueRequests);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine(dequeueRequests + " request(s) in progress");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Client.BeginReceive(new TimeSpan(0, 0, 10), ProcessUrgentEmails, Client);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // If we have made too many requests, wait for them to finish before requesting again.Di2015NewLine                while (dequeueRequests >= MaxThreads && !IsStopped)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    System.Diagnostics.Trace.WriteLine(dequeueRequests + " requests in progress, waiting before requesting more work");Di2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void ProcessUrgentEmails(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var qc = result.AsyncState as QueueClient;Di2015NewLine            var sendEmail = qc.EndReceive(result);Di2015NewLine            // We have received a message or has timeout... either way we decrease our counterDi2015NewLine            Interlocked.Decrement(ref dequeueRequests);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If we have a message, process itDi2015NewLine            if (sendEmail != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var r = new Random();Di2015NewLine                // Process the messageDi2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine("Processing message: " + sendEmail.MessageId);Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(r.Next(10000));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Mark it as completedDi2015NewLine                sendEmail.BeginComplete(ProcessEndComplete, sendEmail);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void ProcessEndComplete(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var bm = result.AsyncState as BrokeredMessage;Di2015NewLine            bm.EndComplete(result);Di2015NewLine            Trace.WriteLine("Completed message: " + bm.MessageId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool OnStart()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Set the maximum number of concurrent connections Di2015NewLine            ServicePointManager.DefaultConnectionLimit = 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the queue if it does not exist alreadyDi2015NewLine            string connectionString = CloudConfigurationManager.GetSetting("Microsoft.ServiceBus.ConnectionString");Di2015NewLine            var namespaceManager = NamespaceManager.CreateFromConnectionString(connectionString);Di2015NewLine            if (!namespaceManager.QueueExists(QueueName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                namespaceManager.CreateQueue(QueueName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Initialize the connection to Service Bus QueueDi2015NewLine            Client = QueueClient.CreateFromConnectionString(connectionString, QueueName);Di2015NewLine            IsStopped = false;Di2015NewLine            return base.OnStart();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void OnStop()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Waiting for all requestes to finish (or timeout) before closingDi2015NewLine            while (dequeueRequests > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Trace.WriteLine(dequeueRequests + " request(s), waiting before stopping");Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Close the connection to Service Bus QueueDi2015NewLine            IsStopped = true;Di2015NewLine            Client.Close();Di2015NewLine            base.OnStop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16790346Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TimePicker : DomainUpDownDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TimePicker()Di2015NewLine    {         Di2015NewLine        // build the list of times, in reverse order because the up/down buttons go the other wayDi2015NewLine        for (double time = 23.5; time >= 0; time -= 0.5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int hour = (int)time; // cast to an int, we only get the whole number which is what we wantDi2015NewLine            int minutes = (int)((time - hour) * 60); // subtract the hour from the time variable to get the remainder of the hour, then multiply by 60 as .5 * 60 = 30 and 0 * 60 = 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.Items.Add(hour.ToString("00") + ":" + minutes.ToString("00")); // format the hour and minutes to always have two digits and concatenate them together with the colon between them, then add to the Items collectionDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.SelectedIndex = Items.IndexOf("09:00"); // select a default timeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Wrap = true; // this enables the picker to go to the first or last item if it is at the end of the list (i.e. if the user gets to 23:30 it wraps back around to 00:00 and vice versa)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16792409Di2015UniqueSeparator    int minimum, maximum;Di2015NewLine    int k = size();Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < size(); ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        --k;Di2015NewLine        minimum = i;Di2015NewLine        maximum = k;Di2015NewLine        if(k - i <= 0)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        for(int j = i; j <= k; ++j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(greaterThan(minimum, j))Di2015NewLine                minimum = j;Di2015NewLine            if(lessThan(maximum, j))Di2015NewLine                maximum = j;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(minimum != i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            swap(minimum, i);Di2015NewLine            if(maximum == i)Di2015NewLine                maximum = minimum;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(maximum != k)Di2015NewLine            swap(maximum, k);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16796940Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictionary<string, ReaderWriterLockSlim> lockDict = new Dictionary<string, ReaderWriterLockSlim>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineReaderWriterLockSlim LockFile(string filename, bool readOnly)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fullPath = System.IO.Path.GetFullPath(filename);Di2015NewLine    ReaderWriterLockSlim myLock;Di2015NewLine    // lock the dictionary while we're accessing itDi2015NewLine    lock (lockDict)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!lockDict.TryGetValue(fullPath, out myLock))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            myLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLine            lockDict[fullPath] = myLock;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // only block on the file lock once the dictionary is unlockedDi2015NewLine    if (readOnly)Di2015NewLine        myLock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        myLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine    // file is now "locked", so caller can proceed with read/write, then unlockDi2015NewLine    return myLock;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16797480Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CsvDataRow : INotifyPropertyChangedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private bool _aa;Di2015NewLine    private string _course;Di2015NewLine    private int _semester;Di2015NewLine    private double _theory;Di2015NewLine    private double _lab;Di2015NewLine    private bool _passed;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool AA { get { return _aa; } set { if (value == _aa) return; _aa = value; NotifyPropertyChanged("AA"); } }Di2015NewLine    public string Course { get { return _course; } set { if (value == _course) return; _course = value; NotifyPropertyChanged("Course"); } }Di2015NewLine    public int Semester { get { return _semester; } set { if (value == _semester) return; _semester = value; NotifyPropertyChanged("Semester"); } }Di2015NewLine    public double Theory { get { return _theory; } set { if (value == _theory) return; _theory = value; NotifyPropertyChanged("Theory"); } }Di2015NewLine    public double Lab { get { return _lab; } set { if (value == _lab) return; _lab = value; NotifyPropertyChanged("Lab"); } }Di2015NewLine    public bool Passed { get { return _passed; } set { if (value == _passed) return; _passed = value; NotifyPropertyChanged("Passed"); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char _delimiter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // static factory method creates object from CSV rowDi2015NewLine    public static CsvDataRow Create(string row, char delimiter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new CsvDataRow(row, delimiter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // private constructor initializes property valuesDi2015NewLine    private CsvDataRow(string row, char delimiter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _delimiter = delimiter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var values = row.Split(_delimiter);Di2015NewLine        AA = (values[0].ToString().Equals("1"));Di2015NewLine        Course = Convert.ToString(values[1]);Di2015NewLine        Semester = Convert.ToInt32(values[2]);Di2015NewLine        Theory = Convert.ToDouble(values[3]);Di2015NewLine        Lab = Convert.ToDouble(values[4]);Di2015NewLine        Passed = (values[5].ToString().Equals("1"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // a method to convert back into a CSV rowDi2015NewLine    public string ToCsvString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = new string[] { (AA ? 1 : 0).ToString(), Course, Semester.ToString(), Theory.ToString(), Lab.ToString(), (Passed ? 1: 0).ToString() };Di2015NewLine        return string.Join(_delimiter.ToString(), values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // INotifyPropertyChanged interface requires this eventDi2015NewLine    public event PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // helper method to raise PropertyChanged eventDi2015NewLine    private void NotifyPropertyChanged(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (PropertyChanged != null) PropertyChanged(this, new PropertyChangedEventArgs(name));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16797480Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CsvDataSourceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public char Delimiter { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public CsvDataSource()Di2015NewLine        : this(',')Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string[] Columns { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ObservableCollection<CsvDataRow> Rows { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CsvDataSource(char delimiter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Delimiter = delimiter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void LoadCsv(string csvFileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string header;Di2015NewLine        string data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(csvFileName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            header = reader.ReadLine(); // assumes 1st row is column headersDi2015NewLine            data = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Columns = header.Split(Delimiter);Di2015NewLine        var rows = Regex.Split(data, Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!rows.Select(row => row.Split(Delimiter)).All(row => row.Length == Columns.Length)) throw new FormatException("Inconsistent data format.");Di2015NewLine        Rows = new ObservableCollection<CsvDataRow>(rows.Select(row => CsvDataRow.Create(row, Delimiter)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16798813Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ComplexExtensions {Di2015NewLine    public static Complex[] NthRoot(this Complex complex, int n) {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Requires(n > 0);Di2015NewLine        var phase = complex.Phase;Di2015NewLine        var magnitude = complex.Magnitude;Di2015NewLine        var nthRootOfMagnitude = Math.Pow(magnitude, 1.0 / n);Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine            Enumerable.Range(0, n)Di2015NewLine                      .Select(k => Complex.FromPolarCoordinates(Di2015NewLine                          nthRootOfMagnitude,Di2015NewLine                          phase / n + k * 2 * Math.PI / n)Di2015NewLine                      )Di2015NewLine                      .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16805583Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnumerable.Zip
16805583Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar resultList = Enumerable.Zip(first, second,Di2015NewLine// or, used as an extension method:  first.Zip(second,Di2015NewLine    (f, s) => newDi2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                  FirstItem = f,Di2015NewLine                  SecondItem = s,Di2015NewLine                  Sum = f + sDi2015NewLine              });Di2015NewLine
16805583Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TResult> OuterZip<TFirst, TSecond, TResult>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TFirst> first, IEnumerable<TSecond> second,Di2015NewLine    Func<TFirst, TSecond, TResult> resultSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<TFirst> firstEnumerator = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<TSecond> secondEnumerator = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool firstHasCurrent = firstEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        bool secondHasCurrent = secondEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (firstHasCurrent || secondHasCurrent)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TFirst firstValue = firstHasCurrentDi2015NewLine                ? firstEnumerator.CurrentDi2015NewLine                : default(TFirst);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TSecond secondValue = secondHasCurrentDi2015NewLine                ? secondEnumerator.CurrentDi2015NewLine                : default(TSecond);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return resultSelector(firstValue, secondValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            firstHasCurrent = firstEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine            secondHasCurrent = secondEnumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16806949Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ShortDateConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public object Convert(object data, Type type, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string format = PrepareFormat(culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime date = (DateTime)data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return date.ToString(format, culture);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public object ConvertBack(object data, Type type, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return DateTime.ParseExact((string)data, PrepareFormat(culture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern), culture);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private string PrepareFormat(string format)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (!format.Contains("dd"))Di2015NewLine      format = format.Replace("d", "dd");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!format.Contains("MM"))Di2015NewLine      format = format.Replace("M", "MM");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!format.Contains("yyyy"))Di2015NewLine      format = format.Replace("yy", "yyyy");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return format;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16812898Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MatrixToDataViewConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var array = value as Matrix;Di2015NewLine        if (array == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //var array = ILMath.rand(3, 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rows = array.Dimensions[0];Di2015NewLine        var columns = array.Dimensions[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var t = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        for (var c = 0; c < columns; c++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            t.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(c.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var r = 0; r < rows; r++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newRow = t.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            for (var c = 0; c < columns; c++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var v = array[r, c];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Round if parameter is setDi2015NewLine                if (parameter != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int digits;Di2015NewLine                    if (int.TryParse(parameter.ToString(), out digits))Di2015NewLine                        v = Math.Round(v, digits);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                newRow[c] = v;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            t.Rows.Add(newRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return t.DefaultView;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16812898Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BoolArrayToDataViewConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var array = value as bool[,];Di2015NewLine        if (array == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var rows = array.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        if (rows == 0) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var columns = array.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine        if (columns == 0) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var t = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add columns with name "0", "1", "2", ...Di2015NewLine        for (var c = 0; c < columns; c++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            t.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(c.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add data to DataTableDi2015NewLine        for (var r = 0; r < rows; r++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newRow = t.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            for (var c = 0; c < columns; c++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newRow[c] = array[r, c];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            t.Rows.Add(newRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return t.DefaultView;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16812900Di2015UniqueSeparator<asp:ModalPopupExtender runat="server"Di2015NewLine    ID="MPEUserList" Di2015NewLine    TargetControlID="SelectUserBtn" Di2015NewLine    PopupControlID="Pnl" Di2015NewLine    BackgroundCssClass="ModalBackground" Di2015NewLine    DropShadow="true" Di2015NewLine    CancelControlID="CancelBtn">Di2015NewLine</asp:ModalPopupExtender>Di2015NewLine
16812951Di2015UniqueSeparator// Load imageDi2015NewLineImage<Gray, float> image = new Image<Gray, float>(@"C:\\Users\\me\\Desktop\\lines.png");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Transform 1 channel grayscale image into 2 channel imageDi2015NewLineIntPtr complexImage = CvInvoke.cvCreateImage(image.Size, Emgu.CV.CvEnum.IPL_DEPTH.IPL_DEPTH_32F, 2);Di2015NewLineCvInvoke.cvSetImageCOI(complexImage, 1); // Select the channel to copy intoDi2015NewLineCvInvoke.cvCopy(image, complexImage, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLineCvInvoke.cvSetImageCOI(complexImage, 0); // Select all channelsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This will hold the DFT dataDi2015NewLineMatrix<float> forwardDft = new Matrix<float>(image.Rows, image.Cols, 2); Di2015NewLineCvInvoke.cvDFT(complexImage, forwardDft, Emgu.CV.CvEnum.CV_DXT.CV_DXT_FORWARD, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCvInvoke.cvReleaseImage(ref complexImage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// We'll display the magnitudeDi2015NewLineMatrix<float> forwardDftMagnitude = GetDftMagnitude(forwardDft); Di2015NewLineSwitchQuadrants(ref forwardDftMagnitude); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now compute the inverse to see if we can get back the originalDi2015NewLineMatrix<float> reverseDft = new Matrix<float>(forwardDft.Rows, forwardDft.Cols, 2);Di2015NewLineCvInvoke.cvDFT(forwardDft, reverseDft, Emgu.CV.CvEnum.CV_DXT.CV_DXT_INV_SCALE, 0);Di2015NewLineMatrix<float> reverseDftMagnitude = GetDftMagnitude(reverseDft);    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepictureBox1.Image = image.ToBitmap();Di2015NewLinepictureBox2.Image = Matrix2Bitmap(forwardDftMagnitude);Di2015NewLinepictureBox3.Image = Matrix2Bitmap(reverseDftMagnitude);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Bitmap Matrix2Bitmap(Matrix<float> matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvNormalize(matrix, matrix, 0.0, 255.0, Emgu.CV.CvEnum.NORM_TYPE.CV_MINMAX, IntPtr.Zero);            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Image<Gray, float> image = new Image<Gray, float>(matrix.Size);Di2015NewLine    matrix.CopyTo(image);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return image.ToBitmap();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Real part is magnitude, imaginary is phase. Di2015NewLine// Here we compute log(sqrt(Re^2 + Im^2) + 1) to get the magnitude and Di2015NewLine// rescale it so everything is visibleDi2015NewLineprivate Matrix<float> GetDftMagnitude(Matrix<float> fftData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //The Real part of the Fourier TransformDi2015NewLine    Matrix<float> outReal = new Matrix<float>(fftData.Size);Di2015NewLine    //The imaginary part of the Fourier TransformDi2015NewLine    Matrix<float> outIm = new Matrix<float>(fftData.Size);Di2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvSplit(fftData, outReal, outIm, IntPtr.Zero, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvPow(outReal, outReal, 2.0);Di2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvPow(outIm, outIm, 2.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvAdd(outReal, outIm, outReal, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvPow(outReal, outReal, 0.5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvAddS(outReal, new MCvScalar(1.0), outReal, IntPtr.Zero); // 1 + MagDi2015NewLine    CvInvoke.cvLog(outReal, outReal); // log(1 + Mag)            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return outReal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// We have to switch quadrants so that the origin is at the image centerDi2015NewLineprivate void SwitchQuadrants(ref Matrix<float> matrix)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int cx = matrix.Cols / 2;Di2015NewLine    int cy = matrix.Rows / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Matrix<float> q0 = matrix.GetSubRect(new Rectangle(0, 0, cx, cy));Di2015NewLine    Matrix<float> q1 = matrix.GetSubRect(new Rectangle(cx, 0, cx, cy));Di2015NewLine    Matrix<float> q2 = matrix.GetSubRect(new Rectangle(0, cy, cx, cy));Di2015NewLine    Matrix<float> q3 = matrix.GetSubRect(new Rectangle(cx, cy, cx, cy));Di2015NewLine    Matrix<float> tmp = new Matrix<float>(q0.Size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    q0.CopyTo(tmp);Di2015NewLine    q3.CopyTo(q0);Di2015NewLine    tmp.CopyTo(q3);Di2015NewLine    q1.CopyTo(tmp);Di2015NewLine    q2.CopyTo(q1);Di2015NewLine    tmp.CopyTo(q2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16818489Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<Subcontractor,bool>
16818489Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc
16818489Di2015UniqueSeparatorWhere
16818489Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ApplicationFormReturnedCheck(ref IList<Subcontractor> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var isFormReturned = new Func<Subcontractor,bool>(Di2015NewLine          x => x.ApplicationFormReturned != null);Di2015NewLine    var isBeforeDate = new Func<Subcontractor,bool>(Di2015NewLine          x => x.ApplicationFormReturned < this.ApplicationFormReturned);Di2015NewLine    var isFormReturnedOrBeforeDate= new Func<Subcontractor,bool>(Di2015NewLine          x => isFormReturned(x) || isFormReturnedBeforeDate(x));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (this.ApplicationFormNotReturnedFlag == true && this.ApplicationFormReturned != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list = list.Where(isFormReturnedOrBeforeDate).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (this.ApplicationFormNotReturnedFlag == true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list = list.Where(isFormReturned).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (this.ApplicationFormReturned != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list = list.Where(isBeforeDate).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16821848Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<string> InclusiveSplitDi2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    string source, Di2015NewLine    string patternDi2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<string> parts = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine  int currIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // First, find all the matches. These are your separators.Di2015NewLine  MatchCollection matches = Di2015NewLine      Regex.Matches(source, pattern, Di2015NewLine      RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // If there are no matches, there's nothing to split, so just return aDi2015NewLine  // collection with just the source string in it.Di2015NewLine  if (matches.Count < 1)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    parts.Add(source);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    foreach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // If the match begins after our current index, we need to add theDi2015NewLine      // portion of the source string between the last match and the Di2015NewLine      // current match.Di2015NewLine      if (match.Index > currIndex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        parts.Add(source.Substring(currIndex, match.Index - currIndex));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Add the matched value, of course, to make the split inclusive.Di2015NewLine      parts.Add(match.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Update the current index so we know if the next match has anDi2015NewLine      // unmatched substring before it.Di2015NewLine      currIndex = match.Index + match.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Finally, check is there is a bit of unmatched string at the end of the Di2015NewLine    // source string.Di2015NewLine    if (currIndex < source.Length)Di2015NewLine      parts.Add(source.Substring(currIndex));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return parts;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16826514Di2015UniqueSeparatorDictonary<string,bool> loadedAssemblies = new Dictonary<string,bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing(SHA1CryptoServiceProvider sha1 = new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var hash = Convert.ToBase64String(sha1.ComputeHash(byteArray));Di2015NewLine    if(loadedAssemblies.ContainsKey(hash)) continue;Di2015NewLine    loadedAssemblies[hash] = true;Di2015NewLine    Assembly dll = Assembly.Load( File.ReadAllBytes(i));Di2015NewLine    SomeInterface if = CreateInstance(dll); //This methods does all the validation and suchDi2015NewLine    if.DoMethod();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16826528Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface MyInterface {Di2015NewLine   void MyMethod(/*...*/);Di2015NewLine   int MyOtherMethod(/*...*/);Di2015NewLine   string MyProperty { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyImplementation : MyInterface {Di2015NewLine    // explicit implementations:Di2015NewLine    void MyInterface.MyMethod (/*...*/) { /* ... */ }Di2015NewLine    string MyInterface.MyProperty { get { return /*...*/; } set { something = value; /*...*/ } }Di2015NewLine    // or even implicit:Di2015NewLine    public int MyOtherMethod(/*...*/) { /* ... */ return /*...*/; }Di2015NewLine    // Now, even you may have some public (better be internal) members,Di2015NewLine    // they should not be used in implementation-agnostic codeDi2015NewLine    internal void SomeNonInterfaceMethod(/*...*/) { /*...*/ }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMyInterface myImplementation = new MyImplementation(/*...*/);Di2015NewLine// NOT MyInterface myImplementation = new MyImplementation(/*...*/);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//some implementation-agnostic method:Di2015NewLinevoid SomeUsingMethod(MyInterface implementation) { // NOT MyImplementation implementationDi2015NewLine                                                   // it would kill the abstractionDi2015NewLine    implementation.MyMethod(/*...*/);Di2015NewLine    implementation.MyProperty = "some value";Di2015NewLine    // but you cannot callDi2015NewLine    // implementation.SomeNonInterfaceMethod(/*...*/); // won't workDi2015NewLine    // if somewhere you need to do thisDi2015NewLine    MyImplementation violatedEncapsulationImplementation = (MyImplementation)implementation; // AVOID IT!Di2015NewLine    violatedEncapsulationImplementation.SomeNonInterfaceMethod(/*...*/); // AVOID IT!Di2015NewLine    // it would work, but it would be an indication of wrong code designDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16826544Di2015UniqueSeparator"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ".IndexOf(letter) % partitionCountDi2015NewLine
16826544Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns partition sized which are as close as possible to equal while using the indicated total size available, with any extra distributed to the frontDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="totalSize">The total number of elements to partition</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="partitionCount">The number of partitions to size</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="remainderAtFront">If true, any remainder will be distributed linearly starting at the beginning; if false, backwards from the end</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>An int[] containing the partition sizes</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static int[] GetEqualizedPartitionSizes(int totalSize, int partitionCount, bool remainderAtFront = true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (totalSize < 1)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Cannot partition a non-positive number (" + totalSize + ")");Di2015NewLine    else if (partitionCount < 1)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Invalid partition count (" + partitionCount + ")");Di2015NewLine    else if (totalSize < partitionCount)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Cannot partition " + totalSize + " elements into " + partitionCount + " partitions");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[] partitionSizes = new int[partitionCount];Di2015NewLine    int basePartitionSize = totalSize / partitionCount;Di2015NewLine    int remainder = totalSize % partitionCount;Di2015NewLine    int remainderPartitionSize = basePartitionSize + 1;Di2015NewLine    int x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (remainderAtFront)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (x = 0; x < remainder; x++)Di2015NewLine            partitionSizes[x] = remainderPartitionSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (x = remainder; x < partitionCount; x++)Di2015NewLine            partitionSizes[x] = basePartitionSize;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (x = 0; x < partitionCount - remainder; x++)Di2015NewLine            partitionSizes[x] = basePartitionSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (x = partitionCount - remainder; x < partitionCount; x++)Di2015NewLine            partitionSizes[x] = remainderPartitionSize;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return partitionSizes;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16828548Di2015UniqueSeparator //  around application start, configure the way values are retrieved   Di2015NewLine //  from names for different types.  Note that this doesn't need to useDi2015NewLine //  a NameValueCollection, but I did so to stay consistent.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine var collection = new NameValueCollection();Di2015NewLine ValueRegistry.Configure<int>(name => GetInt32(collection,name));Di2015NewLine ValueRegistry.Configure<DateTime>(name => GetDateTime(collection,name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine // where you are going to need to get valuesDi2015NewLine var values = new ValueRegistry();      Di2015NewLine int value = values.Get<int>("the name"); // nothing is boxedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ValueRegistryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine       private class Provider<T> Di2015NewLine            where T : structDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine             private static readonly ConcurrentDictionary<ValueRegistry,Provider<T>> Providers = new ConcurrentDictionary<ValueRegistry,Provider<T>>();Di2015NewLine              public static Provider<T> For(ValueRegistry registry)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                  return Providers.GetOrAdd(registry, x => new Provider<T>());Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              private Provider(){Di2015NewLine                 this.entries = new Dictionary<string,T>();Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              private readonly Dictionary<string,T> entries;Di2015NewLine              private static Func<string,T> CustomGetter;Di2015NewLine              public static void Configure(Func<string,T> getter) { CustomGetter = getter;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              public static T GetValueOrDefault(string name)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                   T value;Di2015NewLine                    if(!entries.TryGetValue(name, out value))Di2015NewLine                       entries[name] = value = CustomGetter != null ? CustomGetter(name) : default(T);Di2015NewLine                     return value;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       public T Get<T>(string name) Di2015NewLine          where T : structDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           return Provider<T>.For(this).GetValueOrDefault(name);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       public static void Configure<T>(Func<string,T> customGetter)Di2015NewLine                  where T : structDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          Provider<T>.Configure(customGetter);      Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16831993Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MvcUtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        public static void RenderPartial(string partialViewName, object model)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the HttpContextDi2015NewLine            HttpContextBase httpContextBase = new HttpContextWrapper(HttpContext.Current);Di2015NewLine            // Build the route data, pointing to the Some controllerDi2015NewLine            RouteData routeData = new RouteData();Di2015NewLine            routeData.Values.Add("controller", typeof(Controller).Name);Di2015NewLine            // Create the controller contextDi2015NewLine            ControllerContext controllerContext = new ControllerContext(new RequestContext(httpContextBase, routeData), new Controller());Di2015NewLine            // Find the partial viewDi2015NewLine            IView view = FindPartialView(controllerContext, partialViewName);Di2015NewLine            // create the view context and pass in the modelDi2015NewLine            ViewContext viewContext = new ViewContext(controllerContext, view, new ViewDataDictionary { Model = model }, new TempDataDictionary(), httpContextBase.Response.Output);Di2015NewLine            // finally, render the viewDi2015NewLine            view.Render(viewContext, httpContextBase.Response.Output);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IView FindPartialView(ControllerContext controllerContext, string partialViewName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // try to find the partial viewDi2015NewLine            ViewEngineResult result = ViewEngines.Engines.FindPartialView(controllerContext, partialViewName);Di2015NewLine            if (result.View != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return result.View;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // wasn't found - 16834936Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Contains most values for the rel attribute on an HTML anchor hyperlink elemement.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class HyperlinkRelationshipsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Designates substitute versions for the document in which the link occurs. When used together with the lang attribute, it implies a translated version of the document. When used together with the media attribute, it implies a version designed for a different medium (or media).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string AlternateRelationship = "alternate";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document serving as an appendix in a collection of documents.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string AppendixRelationship = "appendix";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to an external style sheet. See the section on external style sheets for details. This is used together with the link type "Alternate" for user-selectable alternate style sheets.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string AuthorRelationship = "author";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a bookmark. A bookmark is a link to a key entry point within an extended document. The title attribute may be used, for example, to label the bookmark. Note that several bookmarks may be defined in each document.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string BookmarkRelationship = "bookmark";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document serving as a chapter in a collection of documents.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string ChapterRelationship = "chapter";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a copyright statement for the current document.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string CopyrightRelationship = "copyright";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document serving as a table of contents. Some user agents also support the synonym ToC (from "Table of Contents").Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string ContentsRelationship = "contents";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document offering help (more information, links to other sources information, etc.)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string HelpRelationship = "help";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Links to copyright information for the document.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string LicenseRelationship = "license";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document providing a glossary of terms that pertain to the current document.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string GlossaryRelationship = "glossary";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document providing an index for the current document.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string IndexRelationship = "index";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to the next document in a linear sequence of documents. User agents may choose to preload the "next" document, to reduce the perceived load time.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>        Di2015NewLine    public const string NextRelationship = "next";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Links to an unendorsed document, like a paid link. ("nofollow" is used by Google, to specify that the Google search spider should not follow that link)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string NoFollowRelationship = "nofollow";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Specifies that the browser should not send a HTTP referer header if the user follows the hyperlink.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string NoReferrerRelationship = "noreferrer";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Specifies that the target document should be cached.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string PrefetchRelationship = "prefetch";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to the previous document in an ordered series of documents. Some user agents also support the synonym "Previous".Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string PrevRelationship = "prev";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Links to a search tool for the document.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string SearchRelationship = "search";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document serving as a section in a collection of documents.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string SectionRelationship = "section";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to a document serving as a subsection in a collection of documents.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string SubsectionRelationship = "subsection";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to the first document in a collection of documents. This link type tells search engines which document is considered by the author to be the starting point of the collection.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public const string StartRelationship = "start";Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Refers to an external style sheet. 16836493Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ManifestProcessor : ContentProcessor<ContentManifestAsset, ContentManifestContent>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<string, ContentManifestContent> BuildCache = new Dictionary<string, ContentManifestContent>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override ContentManifestContent Process(ContentManifestAsset input, ContentProcessorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContentManifestContent content;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(!BuildCache.TryGetValue(input.Name, out content))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            VerifyStackIntegrity(context, input.Name);Di2015NewLine            content = Build(input, context);Di2015NewLine            BuildCache.Add(input.Name, content);Di2015NewLine            context.BuildStack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return content;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void VerifyStackIntegrity(ContentProcessorContext context, string buildStep)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(context.BuildStack.Count(x => x == buildStep) > 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new CircularBuildException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.BuildStack.Push(buildStep);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ContentManifestContent Build(ContentManifestAsset input, ContentProcessorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // build steps for Manifest/Assets/RecursionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16836493Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ManifestProcessor : ContentProcessor<ContentManifestAsset, ContentManifestContent>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static bool InProgress = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override ContentManifestContent Process(ContentManifestAsset input, ContentProcessorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(InProgress) throw new InProgressBuildException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        InProgress = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Build(input, context);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ContentManifestContent Build(ContentManifestAsset input, ContentProcessorContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ContentManifestContent content;Di2015NewLine        // build steps for Manifest/Assets/RecursionDi2015NewLine        InProgress = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return content;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16836719Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic delegate bool TryParseMethod<T>(string input, out T value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface ITryParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool TryParse(string input, out object value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TryParser<T> : ITryParserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private TryParseMethod<T> ParsingMethod;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TryParser(TryParseMethod<T> parsingMethod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.ParsingMethod = parsingMethod;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool TryParse(string input, out object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T parsedOutput;Di2015NewLine        bool success = ParsingMethod(input, out parsedOutput);Di2015NewLine        value = parsedOutput;Di2015NewLine        return success;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16836719Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DataConversionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, ITryParser> Parsers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static DataConversion()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parsers = new Dictionary<Type, ITryParser>();Di2015NewLine        AddParser<DateTime>(DateTime.TryParse);Di2015NewLine        AddParser<int>(Int32.TryParse);Di2015NewLine        AddParser<double>(Double.TryParse);Di2015NewLine        AddParser<decimal>(Decimal.TryParse);Di2015NewLine        AddParser<string>((string input, out string value) => {value = input; return true;});Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void AddParser<T>(TryParseMethod<T> parseMethod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Parsers.Add(typeof(T), new TryParser<T>(parseMethod));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool Convert<T>(string input, out T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object parseResult;Di2015NewLine        bool success = Convert(typeof(T), input, out parseResult);Di2015NewLine        if (success)Di2015NewLine            value = (T)parseResult;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            value = default(T);Di2015NewLine        return success;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool Convert(Type type, string input, out object value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ITryParser parser;Di2015NewLine        if (Parsers.TryGetValue(type, out parser))Di2015NewLine            return parser.TryParse(input, out value);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException(String.Format("The specified type \\"{0}\\" is not supported.", type.FullName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16838221Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.RuntimeType.FilterHelper
16838221Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetMember
16838221Di2015UniqueSeparator// System.RuntimeTypeDi2015NewLineprivate static void FilterHelper(BindingFlags bindingFlags, ref string name, bool allowPrefixLookup, out bool prefixLookup, out bool ignoreCase, out RuntimeType.MemberListType listType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    prefixLookup = false;Di2015NewLine    ignoreCase = false;Di2015NewLine    if (name != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((bindingFlags & BindingFlags.IgnoreCase) != BindingFlags.Default)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            name = name.ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine            ignoreCase = true;Di2015NewLine            listType = RuntimeType.MemberListType.CaseInsensitive;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listType = RuntimeType.MemberListType.CaseSensitive;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (allowPrefixLookup && name.EndsWith("*", StringComparison.Ordinal))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            name = name.Substring(0, name.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine            prefixLookup = true;Di2015NewLine            listType = RuntimeType.MemberListType.All;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        listType = RuntimeType.MemberListType.All;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16838258Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var myExpression = Express(str => new { Di2015NewLine        String = str, Di2015NewLine        Length = str.Length Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We can compile/use it as well...Di2015NewLine    var compiledExpression = myExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLine    var anonymousOutput = compiledExpression("Input String");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(anonymousOutput.String); // Output: Input StringDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(anonymousOutput.Length); // Output: 12Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Debug.WriteLine(myExpression); // Output: "str => new <>f__AnonymousType0`2(String = str, Length = str.Length)"Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic Expression<Func<String, T>> Express<T>(Expression<Func<String, T>> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return expression;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16838258Di2015UniqueSeparatorString
16838258Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        // Create an anonymous type with two fieldsDi2015NewLine    Type myAnonymousType = CreateNewType<String, Int32>();Di2015NewLine    dynamic myAnon = Activator.CreateInstance(myAnonymousType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    myAnon.FieldA = "A String";Di2015NewLine    myAnon.FieldB = 1234;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(myAnon.FieldA); // Output : "AString"Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(myAnon.FieldB); // Output : 1234Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static Type CreateNewType<TFieldTypeA, TFieldTypeB>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Let's start by creating a new assemblyDi2015NewLine    AssemblyName dynamicAssemblyName = new AssemblyName("MyAsm");Di2015NewLine    AssemblyBuilder dynamicAssembly = AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicAssembly(dynamicAssemblyName, AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine    ModuleBuilder dynamicModule = dynamicAssembly.DefineDynamicModule("MyAsm");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now let's build a new typeDi2015NewLine    TypeBuilder dynamicAnonymousType = dynamicModule.DefineType("MyAnon", TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Let's add some fields to the type.Di2015NewLine    FieldInfo dynamicFieldA = dynamicAnonymousType.DefineField("FieldA", typeof(TFieldTypeA), FieldAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLine    FieldInfo dynamicFieldB = dynamicAnonymousType.DefineField("FieldB", typeof(TFieldTypeB), FieldAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the type to the callerDi2015NewLine    return dynamicAnonymousType.CreateType();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16840829Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string str1 = " d fks z hgi";Di2015NewLine    string str2 = "t t foks n  sn ei";Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(StringCompare(str1,str2)); //34.6153846153846Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(StringCompare("same","same")); //100Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(StringCompare("","")); //100Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(StringCompare("","abcd")); //0  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic double StringCompare(string a, string b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (a == b) //Same string, no iteration needed.Di2015NewLine        return 100;Di2015NewLine    if ((a.Length == 0) || (b.Length == 0)) //One is empty, second is notDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    double maxLen = a.Length > b.Length ? a.Length: b.Length;Di2015NewLine    int minLen = a.Length < b.Length ? a.Length: b.Length;Di2015NewLine    int sameCharAtIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < minLen; i++) //Compare char by charDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a[i] == b[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sameCharAtIndex++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sameCharAtIndex / maxLen * 100;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16842095Di2015UniqueSeparatorpartial class MyDataContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    partial void OnCreated()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CommandTimeout = 5 * 60;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void BulkInsertAll<T>(IEnumerable<T> entities)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        entities = entities.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string cs = Connection.ConnectionString;Di2015NewLine        var conn = new SqlConnection(cs);Di2015NewLine        conn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tableAttribute = (TableAttribute)t.GetCustomAttributes(Di2015NewLine            typeof(TableAttribute), false).Single();Di2015NewLine        var bulkCopy = new SqlBulkCopy(conn) { Di2015NewLine            DestinationTableName = tableAttribute.Name };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var properties = t.GetProperties().Where(EventTypeFilter).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        var table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type propertyType = property.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine            if (propertyType.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine                propertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(Nullable<>))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                propertyType = Nullable.GetUnderlyingType(propertyType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            table.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(property.Name, propertyType));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var entity in entities)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            table.Rows.Add(properties.Select(Di2015NewLine              property => GetPropertyValue(Di2015NewLine              property.GetValue(entity, null))).ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bulkCopy.WriteToServer(table);Di2015NewLine        conn.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool EventTypeFilter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var attribute = Attribute.GetCustomAttribute(p, Di2015NewLine            typeof (AssociationAttribute)) as AssociationAttribute;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (attribute == null) return true;Di2015NewLine        if (attribute.IsForeignKey == false) return true; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object GetPropertyValue(object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (o == null)Di2015NewLine            return DBNull.Value;Di2015NewLine        return o;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16842956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Car> getCars(String ownerid)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Car car;Di2015NewLine    List<Car> c = new List<Car>(); //A List of type Car that will hold all cars owned by a memberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Creating a path to the filesDi2015NewLine    String appPath = HttpContext.Current.Request.PhysicalApplicationPath;Di2015NewLine    String filePath = appPath + "DataStorage\\\\car.xml";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    XmlDocument xd = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine    FileStream xdfile = new FileStream(filePath, FileMode.Open); //Open xml using file streamDi2015NewLine    xd.Load(xdfile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    XmlNodeList cars = xd.GetElementsByTagName("Car");//Get all car nodesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < cars.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlElement CAR = (XmlElement)xd.GetElementsByTagName("Car")[i]; //get the car at position iDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (CAR.GetAttribute("Owner").Equals(ownerid))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Get values and set attributes of a car objectDi2015NewLine            car = new Car();Di2015NewLine            car.setRegistrationNumber(CAR.GetAttribute("reistrationNumber"));Di2015NewLine            car.setYearOfManufacture(CAR.GetAttribute("yearOfManufacture"));Di2015NewLine            car.setOwnerId(CAR.GetAttribute("Owner"));Di2015NewLine            car.setDateOfPurchase(CAR.GetElementsByTagName("DateOfPurchase")[0].ToString());Di2015NewLine            car.setColour(CAR.GetElementsByTagName("Colour")[0].ToString());Di2015NewLine            car.setImage(CAR.GetElementsByTagName("Photos")[0].FirstChild.InnerText);Di2015NewLine            c.Add(car);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    xdfile.Close(); //Close StreamDi2015NewLine    return c;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16843190Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace FourCCDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string fourCC = "YUY2";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Big endian value of {0} is {1}", fourCC, ConvertFourCC(fourCC, toBigEndian:true));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Little endian value of {0} is {1}", fourCC, ConvertFourCC(fourCC));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("GUID value of {0} is {1}", fourCC, ConvertFourCC(fourCC, toGuid:true));Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static string ConvertFourCC(string fourCC, bool toBigEndian = false, bool toGuid = false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(fourCC))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (fourCC.Length != 4)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new FormatException("FOURCC length must be four characters");                    Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char[] c = fourCC.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (toBigEndian)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return String.Format("{0:X}", (c[0] << 24| c[1] << 16 | c[2] << 8 | c[3]));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (toGuid)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return String.Format("{0:X}", (c[3] << 24) | (c[2] << 16) | (c[1] << 8) | c[0]) + "-0000-0010-8000-00AA00389B71";Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return String.Format("{0:X}", (c[3] << 24) | (c[2] << 16) | (c[1] << 8) | c[0]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

hardware.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sealed class BarcodeScannerDeviceDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int counter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsConnected()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine            this.scanner = scanner;Di2015NewLine            timer = new Timer(poll, null, Timeout.Infinite, Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 16844997Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string[] strArr = { "123", "456", "789" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int iterations = 10000000; // 10 millionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Warm up JITterDi2015NewLine    StringJoin();Di2015NewLine    LINQSelectMany();Di2015NewLine    LINQ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < iterations; index++)Di2015NewLine        StringJoin();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.Dump("String.Join");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < iterations; index++)Di2015NewLine        LINQSelectMany();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.Dump("LINQ SelectMany");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < iterations; index++)Di2015NewLine        LINQ();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    sw.ElapsedMilliseconds.Dump("LINQ");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void StringJoin()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] c = string.Join(string.Empty, strArr).ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void LINQSelectMany()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] c = strArr.SelectMany(s => s).ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void LINQ()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var characters = (from s in strArrDi2015NewLine                      from c in sDi2015NewLine                      select c).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16845038Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void dataGridView2_DataError(object sender, DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs     anError)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show("Error happened " + anError.Context.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (anError.Context == DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Commit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Commit error");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (anError.Context == DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.CurrentCellChange)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Cell change");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (anError.Context == DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.Parsing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("parsing error");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (anError.Context == DataGridViewDataErrorContexts.LeaveControl)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("leave control error");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((anError.Exception) is ConstraintException)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataGridView view = (DataGridView)sender;Di2015NewLine        view.Rows[anError.RowIndex].ErrorText = "an error";Di2015NewLine        view.Rows[anError.RowIndex].Cells[anError.ColumnIndex].ErrorText = "an error";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        anError.ThrowException = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16845094Di2015UniqueSeparatorDistributeWinPot.DistributeWinPot(...)
16845094Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate class DistributeWinPot {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static double[] GetWinAmounts(int[] psns, double TotWinAmounts, double HighWeight, double LowWeight) {Di2015NewLine        double[] retval = new double[psns.Length];Di2015NewLine        double fac = -Math.Log(HighWeight / LowWeight) / (psns.Length - 1), sum = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < psns.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            sum += retval[i] = (i == 0 || psns[i] > psns[i - 1] ? HighWeight * Math.Exp(fac * (i - 1)) : retval[i - 1]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        double scaling = TotWinAmounts / sum;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < psns.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            retval[i] *= scaling;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return retval;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        // set up dummy data, positions in an int arrayDi2015NewLine        int[] psns = new int[50];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < psns.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            psns[i] = i+1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        psns[3] = 3;Di2015NewLine        psns[6] = 6;Di2015NewLine        double[] WinAmounts = GetWinAmounts(psns, 10000, 500, 5);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < psns.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.Trace.WriteLine((i + 1) + "," + psns[i] + "," + string.Format("{0:F2}", WinAmounts[i]));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16847202Di2015UniqueSeparator// T[] sourceDi2015NewLine// int destDi2015NewLine// int start, endDi2015NewLineT[] slice = new T[end - start];Di2015NewLineArray.Copy(source, start, slice, 0, slice.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (dest < start)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // push towards endDi2015NewLine    Array.Copy(source, dest, source, dest + slice.Length, start - dest);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // push towards startDi2015NewLine    // who moves where? 16851448Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class StringSimilarityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static float Distance(this string s1, string s2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var p1 = GetPairs(s1);Di2015NewLine        var p2 = GetPairs(s2);Di2015NewLine        return (2f * p1.Intersect(p2).Count()) / (p1.Count + p2.Count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static List<string> GetPairs(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s == null) return new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        if (s.Length < 3) return new List<string>() { s };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < s.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(s.Substring(i, 2).ToLower(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16855094Di2015UniqueSeparatorAction<object>
16855094Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<Action<object>> Callbacks = new List<Action<object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void AddCallback<T1>(object type, Action<T1> callback) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Callbacks.Add((data) => callback((T1)data));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void FireCallback(object data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Action<object> callback = GetCallback();Di2015NewLine    callback(data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16855094Di2015UniqueSeparatorCallbackHandler
16855094Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CallbackHandler<T> : ICallbackHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<Action<T>> Callbacks = new List<Action<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddCallback<T>(Action<T> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Callbacks.Add(callback);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Callback(object data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T typedData = (T)data;Di2015NewLine        foreach(var callback in Callbacks)Di2015NewLine            callback(typedData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface ICallbackHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Callback(object data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16855094Di2015UniqueSeparatorLibrary
16855094Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<Type, ICallbackHandler> AllCallbacks = new Dictionary<Type, ICallbackHandler>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void AddCallback<T>(Action<T> callback) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    ICallbackHandler handler;Di2015NewLine    if (!AllCallbacks.TryGetValue(type, out handler))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        handler = new CallbackHandler<T>();Di2015NewLine        AllCallbacks[type] = handler;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    CallbackHandler<T> typedHandler = (CallbackHandler<T>)handler;Di2015NewLine    typedHandler.AddCallback(callback);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void FireCallback(object data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = data.GetType();Di2015NewLine    ICallbackHandler handler;Di2015NewLine    AllCallbacks.TryGetValue(type, out handler);Di2015NewLine    if (handler != null)Di2015NewLine        handler.Callback(data);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
