16858012Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ObjectLoaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine//----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine// public static methodsDi2015NewLine//----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static object LoadFromAssembly(Di2015NewLine    string srcAssembly,Di2015NewLine    string typeName,Di2015NewLine    Type derivesFrom)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return LoadFromAssembly(srcAssembly, typeName, derivesFrom, true);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static object LoadFromAssembly(Di2015NewLine    string srcAssembly,Di2015NewLine    string typeName,Di2015NewLine    Type derivesFrom, Di2015NewLine    bool throwOnLoadError)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (srcAssembly == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("srcAssembly");Di2015NewLine    else if (srcAssembly.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Value may not be empty.", "srcAssembly");Di2015NewLine    else if (typeName == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("typeName");Di2015NewLine    else if (typeName.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Value may not be empty.", "typeName");Di2015NewLine    else if (derivesFrom == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("derivesFrom");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    object retVal = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string srcAssemblyPath = Path.Combine(AppDir, srcAssembly);Di2015NewLine        Assembly asm = Assembly.LoadFrom(srcAssemblyPath);Di2015NewLine        object obj = asm.CreateInstance(typeName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (obj != null && derivesFrom.IsAssignableFrom(obj.GetType()))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            retVal = obj;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (obj != null) // wrong object, cleanup as neededDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (obj is IDisposable)Di2015NewLine                ((IDisposable)obj).Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (throwOnLoadError)Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        // otherwise null is returned...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return retVal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine// private static methodsDi2015NewLine//----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string AppDirDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

DrawRectangleH(pe, top, height, color1, color2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int left = ClientRectangle.Left;Di2015NewLine / 2;Di2015NewLine            width = ClientRectangle.Width / 2;Di2015NewLine            DrawRectangleV(pe, left, width, color2, color1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        pe.Graphics.DrawRectangle(new Pen(Color.Black), ClientRectangle);Di2015NewLine        base.OnPaint(pe);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void DrawRectangleH(PaintEventArgs pe, int top, int height, Color fromColor, Color toColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rect = new Rectangle(ClientRectangle.Left, top, ClientRectangle.Width, height);Di2015NewLine        var brush = new private void DrawRectangleV(PaintEventArgs pe, int left, int width, Color fromColor, Color toColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rect = new Rectangle(left, ClientRectangle.Top, width, ClientRectangle.Height);Di2015NewLine        var brush = new LinearGradientBrush(rect, fromColor, toColor, LinearGradientMode.Horizontal);Di2015NewLine        if (_blockList.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rectangle[] rects = GetRectanglesV(left, width);Di2015NewLine            if (rects.Length > 0) pe.Graphics.FillRectangles(brush, rects); //SystemBrushes.ControlDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private Rectangle[] GetRectanglesH(int top, int height)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rects = new List<Rectangle>();Di2015NewLine        float xf = 0;Di2015NewLine        int y = top;Di2015NewLine        int h = height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float pf = this.Width / (float)_blockList.Length;Di2015NewLine        //h = this.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Block block in _blockList.List)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (block.PercentProgress > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int x = Convert.ToInt32(xf);Di2015NewLine                float wf = (pf * (block.BlockSize * block.PercentProgress / 100)) + xf - x;Di2015NewLine                int w = Convert.ToInt32(wf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                rects.Add(new Rectangle(x, y, w, h));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            xf += pf * block.BlockSize;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return rects.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Rectangle[] GetRectanglesV(int left, int width)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rects = new List<Rectangle>();Di2015NewLine        float yf = 0;Di2015NewLine        int x = left;Di2015NewLine        int w = width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float pf = this.Height / (float)_blockList.Length;Di2015NewLine        //w = this.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Block block in _blockList.List)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (block.PercentProgress > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int y = Convert.ToInt32(yf);Di2015NewLine Rectangle(x, y, w, h));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yf += pf * block.BlockSize;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return rects.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class BlockListDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int _length;Di2015NewLine    private List<Block>    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Update mode of segmentsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public UpdateMode Update = UpdateMode.All;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ///     setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_length != value && value > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var bools = FullListSegment;Di2015NewLine       throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLine            if (value != null)Di2015NewLine                if (value.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine            int sizeAnterior = 0;Di2015NewLine            var bools = new bool[_length];Di2015NewLine            if (bools.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine UpdateMode.FullListSegment)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool bOld = false;Di2015NewLine            int qtd = 0;Di2015NewLine            int filled = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (value != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (value.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _blockList.Clear();Di2015NewLine                    float percent;Di2015NewLine                    foreach (bool b in value)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine 16875456Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static DateTime GetNextDateOfType(this DateTime date, string ordinality, string dayType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var targetOrdinal = ordinality.ToOrdinal();Di2015NewLine                var dateTest = (targetOrdinal > -1) ? new DateTime(date.Year, date.Month, 1) : date.GetLastDayOfMonth();Di2015NewLine                var dateFound = false;Di2015NewLine                var ordinal = 1;Di2015NewLine                var ordinalReset = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (targetOrdinal > -1) //All cases EXCEPT "last"Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while (!dateFound)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (dateTest.Month > date.Month && !ordinalReset)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ordinal = 1;Di2015NewLine                            ordinalReset = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Test for type:Di2015NewLine                        switch (dayType)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine                                        dateFound = true;Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                if (dateTest.IsWeekDay())Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    ordinal++;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                            case "weekend day":Di2015NewLine                                if (dateTest >= date && {Di2015NewLine                                        dateFound = true;Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                if (dateTest.DayOfWeek == HelperMethods.GetDayOfWeekFromString(dayType))Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    ordinal++;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                   }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return dateTest;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public static DateTime GetLastDayOfMonth(this DateTime date)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return new DateTime(date.Year, date.Month, DateTime.DaysInMonth(date.Year, date.Month));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public static int ToOrdinal(this string ordinal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var result = 0;Di2015NewLine                switch (ordinal.ToLower())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case "first":Di2015NewLine                        result = 1;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case "second":Di2015NewLine                        result = 2;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case "third":Di2015NewLine                        result = 3;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case "fourth":Di2015NewLine                        result = 4;Di2015NewLine                     result = -1;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public static bool IsWeekDay(this DateTime date)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var weekdays = new List<DayOfWeek>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        DayOfWeek.Monday,Di2015NewLine                        DayOfWeek.Tuesday,Di2015NewLine                        DayOfWeek.Wednesday,Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine                var firstOfMonth = new DateTime(month.Year, month.Month, 1);Di2015NewLine                var daysToAdd = ((Int32)startOfWeek - (Int32)month.DayOfWeek) % 7;Di2015NewLine                var firstStartOfWeek = firstOfMonth.AddDays(daysToAdd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var current = firstStartOfWeek;Di2015NewLine                var weeks = current = current.AddDays(7);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return weeks;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public static int (date.Date.AddDays(1).DayOfWeek != CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat.FirstDayOfWeek)Di2015NewLine                    date = date.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return (int)Math.Truncate((double)date.Subtract(beginningOfMonth).TotalDays / 7f) + 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine public static DayOfWeek GetDayOfWeekFromString(string            return dow;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

16876832Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ilPanel1_Load(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // create some X/Y meshgrid data Di2015NewLine    ILArray<float> y = 1, R = ILMath.linspace<float>(-4, 4, 100);Di2015NewLine    ILArray<float> x = ILMath.meshgrid(R, ILMath.linspace<float>(-4, 4, 100), y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // precreate the surface data arrayDi2015NewLine    ILArray<float> Z = ILMath.zeros<float>(x.S[0], x.S[1], 3);Di2015NewLine    // surface expects Z, X and Y coords (in that order)Di2015NewLine    Z[":;:;2"] = y; Z[":;:;1"] = x;Di2015NewLine    Z[":;:;0"] = 0.4f * x * x - 0.2f * y * y * y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // our color data are based on another function Di2015NewLine    ILArray<float> cdata = 1.4f * x * x * x + 0.13f * y * y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // we need cdatas limits for creating a new colormapDi2015NewLine    float min, max; cdata.GetLimits(out min, out max);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get default 'Cool' colormapDi2015NewLine    var colormap = new ILColormap(Colormaps.Cool);Di2015NewLine    // get colormap keys as array: [position,R,G,B,A]Di2015NewLine    ILArray<float> colorkeys = colormap.Data;Di2015NewLine    // helper function to map true values to 0..1 range Di2015NewLine    Func<float, float> map = a => { return (a - min) / (max - min); };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // the value to mark and +/- tolerance width (to make it a visible strip at least)Di2015NewLine    float markValue = 0, tolerance = 0.5f;Di2015NewLine    // sample the colormap at the marked edgesDi2015NewLine    Vector4 key1 = colormap.Map(markValue - tolerance, new Tuple<float, float>(min, max));Di2015NewLine    Vector4 key2 = colormap.Map(markValue + tolerance, new Tuple<float, float>(min, max));Di2015NewLine    // create new keypoints at the edges of marked areaDi2015NewLine    colorkeys[ILMath.end + 1, ":"] = ILMath.array(map(markValue - tolerance), key1.X, key1.Y, key1.Z, 1f); Di2015NewLine    colorkeys[ILMath.end + 1, ":"] = ILMath.array(map(markValue + tolerance), key2.X, key2.Y, key2.Z, 1f); Di2015NewLine    // create new keypoint for the marked area itself; color redDi2015NewLine    colorkeys[ILMath.end + 1, ":"] = ILMath.array(map(markValue), 1f, 0f, 0f, 1f); // redDi2015NewLine    // make a new colormap out of it Di2015NewLine    colormap = new ILColormap(colorkeys);Di2015NewLine    // create & add a plot cube Di2015NewLine    ilPanel1.Scene.Add(new ILPlotCube(twoDMode: false) {Di2015NewLine        // add surface plot, give custom colormap & colormap data ...Di2015NewLine        new ILSurface(Z, colormap: colormap, C: cdata) {Di2015NewLine            // add colorbarDi2015NewLine            Childs = { new ILColorbar() }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16876980Di2015UniqueSeparators = Regex.Replace(s, @"(?s)\\s+(?!(?:(?!</?pre\\b).)*</pre>)", " ");Di2015NewLines = Regex.Replace(s, @"(?s)\\s*\\n\\s*(?!(?:(?!</?pre\\b).)*</pre>)", "\\n");Di2015NewLines = Regex.Replace(s, @"(?s)\\s*\\>\\s*\\<\\s*(?!(?:(?!</?pre\\b).)*</pre>)", "><");Di2015NewLine
16876980Di2015UniqueSeparator(?!          # Assert that the following regex can't be matched here:Di2015NewLine (?:         # Match...Di2015NewLine  (?!        #  (unless the following can be matched:Di2015NewLine   </?pre\\b  #  an opening or closing <pre> tag)Di2015NewLine  )          #  (End of inner lookahead assertion)Di2015NewLine  .          # ...any character (the (?s) makes sure that this includes newlines)Di2015NewLine )*          # Repeat any number of timesDi2015NewLine </pre>      # Match a closing <pre> tagDi2015NewLine)            # (End of outer lookahead assertion)Di2015NewLine

16881065Di2015UniqueSeparatorMersenne Twister
16881065Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace RandomDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* C# Version Copyright (C) 2001 Akihilo Kramot (Takel).       */Di2015NewLine    /* C# porting from a C-program for MT19937, originaly coded by */Di2015NewLine    /* Takuji Nishimura, considering the suggestions by            */Di2015NewLine    /* Topher Cooper and Marc Rieffel in July-Aug. 1997.           */Di2015NewLine    /* This library is free software under the Artistic license:   */Di2015NewLine    /*                                                             */Di2015NewLine    /* You can find the original C-program at                      */Di2015NewLine    /* http://www.math.sci.hiroshima-u.ac.jp/~m-mat/MT/emt.html    */Di2015NewLine    /*                                                             */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Implements a Mersenne Twister Random Number Generator. This class provides the same interfaceDi2015NewLine    /// as the standard System.Random number generator, plus some additional functions.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MersenneTwister: System.RandomDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /* Period parameters */Di2015NewLine        private const int N = 624;Di2015NewLine        private const int M = 397;Di2015NewLine        private const uint MATRIX_A = 0x9908b0df; /* constant vector a */Di2015NewLine        private const uint UPPER_MASK = 0x80000000; /* most significant w-r bits */Di2015NewLine        private const uint LOWER_MASK = 0x7fffffff; /* least significant r bits */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* Tempering parameters */Di2015NewLine        private const uint TEMPERING_MASK_B = 0x9d2c5680;Di2015NewLine        private const uint TEMPERING_MASK_C = 0xefc60000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static uint TEMPERING_SHIFT_U( uint y ) { return ( y >> 11 ); }Di2015NewLine        private static uint TEMPERING_SHIFT_S( uint y ) { return ( y << 7 ); }Di2015NewLine        private static uint TEMPERING_SHIFT_T( uint y ) { return ( y << 15 ); }Di2015NewLine        private static uint TEMPERING_SHIFT_L( uint y ) { return ( y >> 18 ); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private uint[] mt = new uint[N]; /* the array for the state vector  */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private uint seed_;Di2015NewLine        private short mti;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static uint[] mag01 = { 0x0, MATRIX_A };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Create a twister with the specified seed. All sequences started with the same seed will containDi2015NewLine        /// the same random numbers in the same order.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="seed">The seed with which to start the twister.</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MersenneTwister( uint seed )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Seed = seed;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Create a twister seeded from the system clock to make it as random as possible.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MersenneTwister()Di2015NewLine            : this( ( (uint) DateTime.Now.Ticks ) )  // A random initial seed is used.Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The seed that was used to start the random number generator.Di2015NewLine        /// Setting the seed resets the random number generator with the new seed.Di2015NewLine        /// All sequences started with the same seed will contain the same random numbers in the same order.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public uint SeedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                seed_ = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                /* setting initial seeds to mt[N] using         */Di2015NewLine                /* the generator Line 25 of Table 1 in          */Di2015NewLine                /* [KNUTH 1981, The Art of Computer Programming */Di2015NewLine                /*    Vol. 2 (2nd Ed.), pp102]                  */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                mt[0] = seed_ & 0xffffffffU;Di2015NewLine                for ( mti = 1; mti < N; mti++ )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mt[mti] = ( 69069 * mt[mti - 1] ) & 0xffffffffU;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return seed_;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Generate a random uint.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A random uint.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected uint GenerateUInt()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uint y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            /* mag01[x] = x * MATRIX_A  for x=0,1 */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( mti >= N ) /* generate N words at one time */Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                short kk;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for ( kk = 0; kk < N - M; kk++ )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    y = ( mt[kk] & UPPER_MASK ) | ( mt[kk + 1] & LOWER_MASK );Di2015NewLine                    mt[kk] = mt[kk + M] ^ ( y >> 1 ) ^ mag01[y & 0x1];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for ( ; kk < N - 1; kk++ )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    y = ( mt[kk] & UPPER_MASK ) | ( mt[kk + 1] & LOWER_MASK );Di2015NewLine                    mt[kk] = mt[kk + ( M - N )] ^ ( y >> 1 ) ^ mag01[y & 0x1];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                y = ( mt[N - 1] & UPPER_MASK ) | ( mt[0] & LOWER_MASK );Di2015NewLine                mt[N - 1] = mt[M - 1] ^ ( y >> 1 ) ^ mag01[y & 0x1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                mti = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            y = mt[mti++];Di2015NewLine            y ^= TEMPERING_SHIFT_U( y );Di2015NewLine            y ^= TEMPERING_SHIFT_S( y ) & TEMPERING_MASK_B;Di2015NewLine            y ^= TEMPERING_SHIFT_T( y ) & TEMPERING_MASK_C;Di2015NewLine            y ^= TEMPERING_SHIFT_L( y );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return y;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns the next uint in the random sequence.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>The next uint in the random sequence.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual uint NextUInt()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.GenerateUInt();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns a random number between 0 and a specified maximum.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="maxValue">The upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to zero.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A 32-bit unsigned integer greater than or equal to zero, and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes zero but not MaxValue.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual uint NextUInt( uint maxValue )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (uint) ( this.GenerateUInt() / ( (double) uint.MaxValue / maxValue ) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns an unsigned random number from a specified range.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="minValue">The lower bound of the random number returned.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="maxValue">The upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue;Di2015NewLine        /// that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not MaxValue.Di2015NewLine        /// If minValue equals maxValue, minValue is returned.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual uint NextUInt( uint minValue, uint maxValue ) /* throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException */Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (minValue >= maxValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (minValue == maxValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return minValue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("minValue", "NextUInt() called with minValue >= maxValue");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (uint) ( this.GenerateUInt() / ( (double) uint.MaxValue / ( maxValue - minValue ) ) + minValue );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns a nonnegative random number.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero and less than int.MaxValue.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override int Next()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (int) ( this.GenerateUInt() / 2 );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="maxValue">The upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to zero.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero, and less than maxValue;Di2015NewLine        /// that is, the range of return values includes zero but not MaxValue.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override int Next( int maxValue ) /* throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException */Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( maxValue <= 0 )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ( maxValue == 0 )Di2015NewLine                    return 0;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException( "maxValue", "Next() called with a negative parameter" );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (int) ( this.GenerateUInt() / ( uint.MaxValue / maxValue ) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns a signed random number from a specified range.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="minValue">The lower bound of the random number returned.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="maxValue">The upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue;Di2015NewLine        /// that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not MaxValue.Di2015NewLine        /// If minValue equals maxValue, minValue is returned.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override int Next( int minValue, int maxValue ) /* ArgumentOutOfRangeException */Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (minValue >= maxValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (minValue == maxValue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return minValue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("minValue", "Next() called with minValue > maxValue");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (int) ( this.GenerateUInt() / ( (double) uint.MaxValue / ( maxValue - minValue ) ) + minValue );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Fills an array of bytes with random numbers from 0..255Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="buffer">The array to be filled with random numbers.</param>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void NextBytes( byte[] buffer ) /* throws ArgumentNullException*/Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bufLen = buffer.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if ( buffer == null )Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentNullException("buffer");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for ( int idx = 0; idx < bufLen; idx++ )Di2015NewLine                buffer[idx] = (byte) ( this.GenerateUInt() / ( uint.MaxValue / byte.MaxValue ) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns a double-precision random number in the range [0..1[Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>A random double-precision floating point number greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.</returns>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override double NextDouble()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (double) this.GenerateUInt() / uint.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

", "", command[ii]); Di2015NewLine        string cid = preg_replace(" (.*", "", temp); Di2015NewLine        temp = preg_replace(".* (wait: ", "", command[ii]); Di2015NewLine        string wait = preg_replace(",.*", "", temp); Di2015NewLine        temp = preg_replace(".*, prio: ", "", command[ii]); Di2015NewLine        string prio = preg_replace(").*", "", temp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        array[x] = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine        array[x]["no"] = no;Di2015NewLine        array[x]["cid"] = cid;Di2015NewLine        array[x]["wait"] = wait;Di2015NewLine        array[x]["prio"] = prio;Di2015NewLine        array[x]["debug"] = command[ii];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring preg_replace(string aa, string bb, string cc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return aa + bb + cc;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16886454Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing Microsoft.Win32;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace NamespaceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic static class DefaultSystemBrowserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static bool initialized = false;Di2015NewLine    private static string path = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string PathDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CheckForErrors();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return path;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Icon IconDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            CheckForErrors();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Icon.ExtractAssociatedIcon( path );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Bitmap BitmapDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CheckForErrors();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Icon.ExtractAssociatedIcon( path ).ToBitmap();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void CheckForErrors()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( !initialized )Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException( "You can't use DefaultSystemBrowser class before you call Determine()." );Di2015NewLine        if ( ErrorMessage != null )Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException( "You can't use DefaultSystemBrowser class if call to Determine() resulted in error." );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Null if no error occured, error description otherwise.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static string ErrorMessageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine        private set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Finds out all information about current default browser. You can call this method every time you want to find out default browser.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static void Determine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        path = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        initialized = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RegistryKey regKey = null;Di2015NewLine        ErrorMessage = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //set the registry key we want to openDi2015NewLine            regKey = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey( "HTTP\\\\shell\\\\open\\\\command", false );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get rid of the enclosing quotesDi2015NewLine            path = regKey.GetValue( null ).ToString().ToLower().Replace( "" + (char) 34, "" );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //check to see if the value ends with .exe (this way we can remove any command line arguments)Di2015NewLine            if ( !path.EndsWith( "exe" ) )Di2015NewLine                //get rid of all command line arguments (anything after the .exe must go)Di2015NewLine                path = path.Substring( 0, path.LastIndexOf( ".exe" ) + 4 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            initialized = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch ( Exception ex )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ErrorMessage = string.Format( "ERROR: An exception of type: {0} occurred in method: {1} in the following module: {2}", ex.GetType(), ex.TargetSite, typeof( DefaultSystemBrowser ) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //check and see if the key is still open, if soDi2015NewLine            //then close itDi2015NewLine            if ( regKey != null )Di2015NewLine                regKey.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16891938Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HorizontalGrid : DataGridDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnItemsSourceChanged(System.Collections.IEnumerable oldValue, System.Collections.IEnumerable newValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnItemsSourceChanged(oldValue, newValue);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var seed in Columns.OfType<SeedColumn>().ToList())Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            var seedColumnIndex = Columns.IndexOf(seed) + 1;Di2015NewLine            var collectionName = seed.CollectionName;Di2015NewLine            var headers = seed.Headers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check if ItemsSource is IEnumerable<object>Di2015NewLine            var data = ItemsSource as IEnumerable<object>;Di2015NewLine            if (data == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy to list to allow for multiple iterationsDi2015NewLine            var dataList = data.ToList();Di2015NewLine            var collections = dataList.Select(d => GetCollection(collectionName, d));Di2015NewLine            var maxItems = collections.Max(c => c.Count());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < maxItems; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var header = GetHeader(headers, i);Di2015NewLine                var columnBinding = new Binding(string.Format("{0}[{1}]" , seed.CollectionName , i));Di2015NewLine                Columns.Insert(seedColumnIndex + i, new DataGridTextColumn {Binding = columnBinding, Header = header});Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetHeader(IList<string> headerList, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var listIndex = index % headerList.Count;Di2015NewLine        return headerList[listIndex];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<object> GetCollection(string collectionName, object collectionHolder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Reflect the property which holds the collectionDi2015NewLine        var propertyInfo = collectionHolder.GetType().GetProperty(collectionName);Di2015NewLine        // Get the property value of the property on the collection holderDi2015NewLine        var propertyValue = propertyInfo.GetValue(collectionHolder, null);Di2015NewLine        // Cast the valueDi2015NewLine        var collection = propertyValue as IEnumerable<object>;Di2015NewLine        return collection;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SeedColumn : DataGridTextColumnDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty CollectionNameProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("CollectionName", typeof (string), typeof (SeedColumn), new PropertyMetadata(default(string)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty HeadersProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("Headers", typeof (List<string>), typeof (SeedColumn), new PropertyMetadata(default(List<string>)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<string> HeadersDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (List<string>) GetValue(HeadersProperty); }Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue(HeadersProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string CollectionNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return (string) 16891938Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ResourceConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var resources = value as IEnumerable<ResourceViewModel>;Di2015NewLine        if (resources== null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Better play safe and serach for the max count of all itemsDi2015NewLine        var columns = resources[0].ResourceStringList.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var t = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        t.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("ResourceName"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var c = 0; c < columns; c++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Will create headers "0", "1", "2", etc. for stringsDi2015NewLine            t.Columns.Add(new DataColumn(c.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var r in resources)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var newRow = t.NewRow();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            newRow[0] = resources.ResourceName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (var c = 0; c < columns; c++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newRow[c+1] = r.ResourceStringList[c];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            t.Rows.Add(newRow);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return t.DefaultView;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16894176Di2015UniqueSeparator    var importData = new DataSet();Di2015NewLine    xmlData.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine    importData.ReadXml(xmlData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var connection = new SqlConnection(myConnectionString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      connection.Open();Di2015NewLine      using (var trans = connection.BeginTransaction())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        using (var sbc = new SqlBulkCopy(connection, SqlBulkCopyOptions.Default, trans) { DestinationTableName = myTableName })Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          foreach (DataColumn col in importData.Tables[0].Columns)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            sbc.ColumnMappings.Add(col.ColumnName, col.ColumnName);Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          sbc.WriteToServer(importData.Tables[0]); //table 0 is the main table in this datasetDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // Now lets call the stored proc.Di2015NewLine          var cmd = new SqlCommand("ProcessDataImport", connection)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                CommandType = CommandType.StoredProcedureDi2015NewLine              };Di2015NewLine          cmd.CommandTimeout = 1200;Di2015NewLine          cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          trans.Commit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        connection.Close();Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
16894176Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE [ProcessDataImport]Di2015NewLineASDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine  DECLARE @IMPORTCOL INTDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  WHILE EXISTS (SELECT X FROM TEMPTABLE)Di2015NewLine  BEGINDi2015NewLine    SELECT @IMPORTCOL = (SELECT TOP 1 COLUMN1 FROM TEMPTABLE)Di2015NewLine    EXEC DOTHEIMPORT @IMPORTCOLDi2015NewLine    DELETE FROM TEMPTABLE WHERE COLUMN1 = @IMPORTCOLDi2015NewLine  ENDDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

16895422Di2015UniqueSeparator// add these fieldsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate TimeSpan[] _interval;Di2015NewLineprivate DateTime[] _startTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// when you create timer1 array, need to initialize the above arraysDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint len = timer1.Length;Di2015NewLine_interval = new TimeSpan[len];Di2015NewLine_startTime = new DateTime[len];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// change SetTimers method as follows;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void SetTimers(int timer, DataRow row)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   TimeSpan dueTime;Di2015NewLine   TimeSpan interval;Di2015NewLine   SetTimeIntervals(row, out dueTime, out interval); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   _interval[timer] = interval;Di2015NewLine   _startTime[timer] = DateTime.Now + dueTime;Di2015NewLine   object[] obj = new object[2]{row, timer};              Di2015NewLine   timer1[timer] = new System.Threading.Timer(databaseTrensfer, obj, dueTime, interval);  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// change databaseTrensfer method as followsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void databaseTrensfer(object state)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   object[] obj = (object[])state;Di2015NewLine   DataRow row = (DataRow)obj[0];Di2015NewLine   string alarmType = Convert.ToString(row["EBase"]);Di2015NewLine   if (alarmType != "Milisecond" && alarmType != "Once")Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      int timer = (int)obj[1];Di2015NewLine      DateTime dt = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine      long elapsedMs = Convert.ToInt64((dt - _startTime[timer]).TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine      long intervalMs = Convert.ToInt64(_interval[timer].TotalMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine      long remainder = elapsedMs % intervalMs;Di2015NewLine      if (remainder != 0L)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         timer1[timer].Change(_interval[timer] - TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(remainder), _interval[timer]);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }  Di2015NewLine   //code      Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16907575Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public enum DirectionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Up, Di2015NewLine        Down, Di2015NewLine        Right, Di2015NewLine        LeftDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int delay = 75;Di2015NewLine        string snake = "O";Di2015NewLine        char border = 'X';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int x, y;Di2015NewLine        int length;Di2015NewLine        bool crashed = false;Di2015NewLine        Direction curDirection = Direction.Up;Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, bool> eaten = new Dictionary<string, bool>();Di2015NewLine        Console.CursorVisible = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ConsoleKeyInfo cki;Di2015NewLine        bool quit = false;Di2015NewLine        while (!quit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine            Console.Title = "Use 'a', 's', 'd' and 'w' to steer.  Hit 'q' to quit.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // draw border around the console:Di2015NewLine            string row = new String(border, Console.WindowWidth);Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(0, 0);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(row);Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(0, Console.WindowHeight - 2);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(row);Di2015NewLine            for (int borderY = 0; borderY < Console.WindowHeight - 2; borderY++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(0, borderY);Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(border.ToString());Di2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(Console.WindowWidth - 1, borderY);Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(border.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // reset all game variables:Di2015NewLine            length = 1;Di2015NewLine            crashed = false;Di2015NewLine            curDirection = Direction.Up;Di2015NewLine            eaten.Clear();Di2015NewLine            x = Console.WindowWidth / 2;Di2015NewLine            y = Console.WindowHeight / 2;Di2015NewLine            eaten.Add(x.ToString("00") + y.ToString("00"), true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // draw new snake:Di2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(x, y);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(snake);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // wait for initial keypress:Di2015NewLine            while (!Console.KeyAvailable)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(10);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // see if intitial direction should be changed:Di2015NewLine            cki = Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine            switch (cki.KeyChar)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 'w':Di2015NewLine                    curDirection = Direction.Up;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case 's':Di2015NewLine                    curDirection = Direction.Down;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case 'a':Di2015NewLine                    curDirection = Direction.Left;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case 'd':Di2015NewLine                    curDirection = Direction.Right;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case 'q':Di2015NewLine                    quit = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // main game loop:Di2015NewLine            DateTime nextCheck = DateTime.Now.AddMilliseconds(delay);Di2015NewLine            while (!quit && !crashed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Title = "Length: " + length.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // consume keystrokes and change current direction until the delay has expired:Di2015NewLine                // *The snake won't actually move until after the delay!Di2015NewLine                while (nextCheck > DateTime.Now)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (Console.KeyAvailable)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        cki = Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine                        switch (cki.KeyChar)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            case 'w':Di2015NewLine                                curDirection = Direction.Up;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            case 's':Di2015NewLine                                curDirection = Direction.Down;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            case 'a':Di2015NewLine                                curDirection = Direction.Left;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            case 'd':Di2015NewLine                                curDirection = Direction.Right;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            case 'q':Di2015NewLine                                quit = true;Di2015NewLine                                break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // if the user didn't quit, attempt to move without hitting the border:Di2015NewLine                if (!quit)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string key = "";Di2015NewLine                    switch (curDirection)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case Direction.Up:Di2015NewLine                            if (y > 1)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                y--;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                crashed = true;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        case Direction.Down:Di2015NewLine                            if (y < Console.WindowHeight - 3)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                y++;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                crashed = true;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        case Direction.Left:Di2015NewLine                            if (x > 1)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                x--;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                crashed = true;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        case Direction.Right:Di2015NewLine                            if (x < Console.WindowWidth - 2)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                x++;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                crashed = true;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // if the user didn't hit the border, see if they hit the snakeDi2015NewLine                    if (!crashed)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        key = x.ToString("00") + y.ToString("00");Di2015NewLine                        if (!eaten.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            length++;Di2015NewLine                            eaten.Add(key, true);Di2015NewLine                            Console.SetCursorPosition(x, y);Di2015NewLine                            Console.Write(snake);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            crashed = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // set the next delay:Di2015NewLine                    nextCheck = DateTime.Now.AddMilliseconds(delay);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } // end main game loopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (crashed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Title = "*** Crashed! *** Length: " + length.ToString() + "     Hit 'q' to quit, or 'r' to retry!";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // wait for quit or retry:Di2015NewLine                bool retry = false;Di2015NewLine                while (!quit && !retry)Di2015NewLine 16908788Di2015UniqueSeparator  // start by loading the workbookDi2015NewLine  HSSFWorkbook workbook;Di2015NewLine  using (var stream = new FileStream(@"c:\\Temp\\birthdays.xls", FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var fs = new POIFSFileSystem(stream);Di2015NewLine    workbook = new HSSFWorkbook(fs);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // now get the worksheet that has the birthdays; I am just using the first sheetDi2015NewLine  var birthdaySheet = workbook.GetSheetAt(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // we are going to populate a list of Birthday objects in memory that we can then sort and write back into the file;Di2015NewLine  // the Birthday class is defined belowDi2015NewLine  var birthdays = new Collection<Birthday>();Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < birthdaySheet.LastRowNum; i++) // the LastRowNum property is very useful!Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    birthdays.Add(new BirthdayDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                      Name = birthdaySheet.GetRow(i).GetCell(0).StringCellValue, // name is in column A, which is 0Di2015NewLine                      Bday = birthdaySheet.GetRow(i).GetCell(1).NumericCellValue // birthday is in column B, which is 1Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // now we sort the birthdaysDi2015NewLine  var sorted = birthdays.OrderBy(b => b.Name).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // now we go back through the cells and write over the values with the sorted valuesDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < sorted.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    birthdaySheet.GetRow(i).GetCell(0).SetCellValue(sorted[i].Name);Di2015NewLine    birthdaySheet.GetRow(i).GetCell(1).SetCellValue(sorted[i].Bday);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // finally, save the workbookDi2015NewLine  using (var stream = new FileStream(@"c:\\temp\\birthdays.xls", FileMode.Truncate))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    workbook.Write(stream);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<TextBox[]> _textBoxes;Di2015NewLine        public Form1()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine   row3[0] = textBox9;Di2015NewLine            row3[1] = textBox10;Di2015NewLine            row3[2] = textBox11;Di2015NewLine            row3[3] = textBox12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TextBox[] row4 = new TextBox[4];Di2015NewLine            row4[0] = textBox13;Di2015NewLine            row4[1] = textBox14;Di2015NewLine            row4[2] = textBox15;Di2015NewLine            row4[3] = textBox16;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this._textBoxes.Add(row1);Di2015NewLine            this._textBoxes.Add(row2);Di2015NewLine            this._textBoxes.Add(row3);Di2015NewLine            this._textBoxes.Add(row4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         /// <summary>Di2015NewLine         /// Processes a command key.Di2015NewLine         /// </summary>Di2015NewLine         /// <param name="msg">A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message"/>, passed by reference, that represents the Win32 message to process.</param>Di2015NewLine         /// <param name="keyData">One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys"/> values that represents the key to process.</param>Di2015NewLine         /// <returns>Di2015NewLine         /// true if the keystroke was processed and consumed by the control; otherwise, false to allow further processing.Di2015NewLine         /// </returns>Di2015NewLine        protected override bool ProcessCmdKey(ref Message msg, Keys keyData)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //A key was pressed! Di2015NewLine            Control activeCtrl = this.ActiveControl;Di2015NewLine            TextBox txb = activeCtrl as TextBox;Di2015NewLine            //Handle it only if it was sent when a textbox was focusedDi2015NewLine            if (txb != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int row;Di2015NewLine                int column;Di2015NewLine                //find out which text box is currently activeDi2015NewLine                this.GetTextBoxIndexes(txb, out row, out column);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //change indexes according to key strokeDi2015NewLine                if (keyData == Keys.Up)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    row--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (keyData == Keys.Down)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    row++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (keyData == Keys.Left)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    column--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (keyData == Keys.Right)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    column++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //Make sure we are not in negative / out of ranfe indexDi2015NewLine                row = Math.Abs(row + 4) % 4;Di2015NewLine                column = Math.Abs(column + 4) % 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //focus requested text boxDi2015NewLine                TextBox slected = this._textBoxes[row][column];Di2015NewLine                slected.Focus();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //don't forget not to break the chain...Di2015NewLine            return base.ProcessCmdKey(ref msg, keyData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Gets the text box indexes.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="txb">The texbox.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="row">The out row index.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="column">The out column index.</param>Di2015NewLine        private void GetTextBoxIndexes(TextBox txb, out int row, out int column)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            row = -1;Di2015NewLine            column = -1;Di2015NewLine            for (int rowIdx = 0; rowIdx < this._textBoxes.Count; rowIdx++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TextBox[] currRow = this._textBoxes[rowIdx];Di2015NewLine                for (int colIdx = 0; colIdx < currRow.Length; colIdx++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    TextBox currTextBox = this._textBoxes[rowIdx][colIdx];Di2015NewLine                    if (currTextBox.Equals(txb))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        row = rowIdx;Di2015NewLine                        column = colIdx;Di2015NewLine                        return;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16917025Di2015UniqueSeparatorModel.Order orderAlias = null;Di2015NewLineModel.Unit unitsAlias = null;Di2015NewLineModel.Employee employeeAlias = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIList<Model.Unit> itemList = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (m_hibernateSession.BeginTransaction())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IQueryOver<Model.Order, Model.Order> orderQuery = m_hibernateSession.QueryOver<Model.Order>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // order related filtersDi2015NewLine    if (propertiesNames.Keys.Contains("OrderPONumber")) orderQuery.Where(o => o.PONumber == Int32.Parse((string)propertiesNames["OrderPONumber"]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // retrieve amount of orders (e.g. 5)Di2015NewLine    orderQuery.Where(o => o.PONumber != 0).Select(o => o.ID).OrderBy(o => o.PONumber).Desc.Take(amount); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int[] orderIDList = orderQuery.List<int>().ToArray(); // get ID list of filtered ordersDi2015NewLine    IQueryOver<Model.Unit, Model.Unit> query = m_hibernateSession.QueryOver<Model.Unit>(() => unitsAlias)                                        Di2015NewLine                        .WhereRestrictionOn(o => o.OrderRef.ID).IsIn(orderIDList) // set order ID rangeDi2015NewLine                        .JoinAlias(() => unitsAlias.EmployeeRef, () => employeeAlias, JoinType.InnerJoin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // additional filtersDi2015NewLine    if (propertiesNames.Keys.Contains("CostCenter")) query.Where(() => unitsAlias.CostCenter == (string)propertiesNames["CostCenter"]);                Di2015NewLine    if (propertiesNames.Keys.Contains("Employee")) query.Where(Restrictions.On(() => employeeAlias.Name).IsLike( "%" + (string)propertiesNames["Employee"] + "%"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    itemList = query.List<Model.Unit>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16922169Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar cancellationTokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLinevar cancellation = cancellationTokenSource.Token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid UpdateDatabases(IEnumerable<...> databases, CancellationToken cancellation)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   foreach(db in databases)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //create as many ProgressBar instances as databases you want to updateDi2015NewLine   //check if ProgressBar exist, then return it and reuse, otherwise create newDi2015NewLine   ProgressBar pb = new ProgressBar();   Di2015NewLine   pb.Maximum = iterations;   Di2015NewLine   pb.Dock = DockStyle.Fill;   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Controls.Add(pb);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //start thread for every database/progress barDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Task.Factory.StartNew(progressBar => Di2015NewLine  {   Di2015NewLine      var start = (ProgressBar)progressBar).Value; //use last value in case of pauseDi2015NewLine      Parallel.For(start, iterations, Di2015NewLine          new ParallelOptions(){CancellationToken =  cancellation}Di2015NewLine      (i, loopState) =>  Di2015NewLine      {   Di2015NewLine          if (loopState.ShouldExitCurrentIteration)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine          //perhaps check loopState.ShouldExitCurrentIteration inside worker methodDi2015NewLine          Thread.SpinWait(50000000); // do work here   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          BeginInvoke((Action)delegate { ((ProgressBar)progressBar).Value++; });   Di2015NewLine      });   Di2015NewLine   }, Di2015NewLine   pb, cancellation)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   .ContinueWith(task => Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      //to handle exceptions use task.Exception memberDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var progressBar = (ProgressBar)task.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine      if (!task.IsCancelled)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          //hide progress bar here and reset pb.Value = 0Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine  }, Di2015NewLine  TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext() //update UI from UI threadDi2015NewLine  ); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //.........Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //CallDi2015NewLine UpdateDatabases(databases, cancellation)  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //To suspend, call Di2015NewLine cancellationTokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //To resume - simply call UpdateDatabases  againDi2015NewLine cancellationTokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine cancellation = cancellationTokenSource.Token;Di2015NewLine UpdateDatabases(databases, cancellation)  Di2015NewLine

16922835Di2015UniqueSeparator//Dead-simple implementation of ICommandDi2015NewLine//Serves as an abstraction of Actions performed by the user via interaction with the UI (for instance, Button Click)Di2015NewLinepublic class Command : ICommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Action Action { get; 16923759Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static RoutedEvent GetEvent(this UIElement source, string eventName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(eventName))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("eventName");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // check if the type is directly in there, otherwise you need a second pass and a more general approachDi2015NewLine        RoutedEvent routedEvent = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // this may return null...Di2015NewLine        RoutedEvent[] events = EventManager.GetRoutedEventsForOwner(source.GetType());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (events != null)Di2015NewLine            routedEvent = events.FirstOrDefault(p => p.Name == eventName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return routedEvent ?? EventManager.GetRoutedEvents().FirstOrDefault(p => p.OwnerType.IsInstanceOfType(source) && p.Name == eventName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RaiseEvent(this UIElement source, string eventName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RoutedEvent routedEvent = GetEvent(source, eventName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (routedEvent != null)Di2015NewLine            source.RaiseEvent(new RoutedEventArgs(routedEvent, source));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16923769Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ShowErrors(System.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeException e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineSystem.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeErrorCollection errorCollection = e.Errors;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineStringBuilder bld = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineException inner = e.InnerException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(e.HelpLink))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bld.Append("\\nCommand text: ");Di2015NewLine    bld.Append(e.HelpLink);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (null != inner)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bld.Append("\\nInner Exception: " + inner.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// Enumerate the errors to a message box.Di2015NewLineforeach (System.Data.SqlServerCe.SqlCeError err in errorCollection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bld.Append("\\n Error Code: " + err.HResult.ToString("X", System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture));Di2015NewLine    bld.Append("\\n Message   : " + err.Message);Di2015NewLine    bld.Append("\\n Minor Err.: " + err.NativeError);Di2015NewLine    bld.Append("\\n Source    : " + err.Source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Enumerate each numeric parameter for the error.Di2015NewLine    foreach (int numPar in err.NumericErrorParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (0 != numPar) bld.Append("\\n Num. Par. : " + numPar);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Enumerate each string parameter for the error.Di2015NewLine    foreach (string errPar in err.ErrorParameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(errPar)) bld.Append("\\n Err. Par. : " + errPar);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return bld.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16924906Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Process(int count, int id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var query = session.Query<A>().Where(BuildFilter(count,id));Di2015NewLine    var result = query.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Expression<Func<A, bool>> BuildFilter(int count, int id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var x = Expression.Parameter(typeof(A), "x");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Expression instance = x;Di2015NewLine   if (count != 0)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var prop = typeof(A).GetProperty("ParentA");Di2015NewLine      while (count > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         instance = Expression.Property(instance, prop);Di2015NewLine         count--;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   var instanceId = Expression.Property(instance, "Id");Di2015NewLine   var compareId = Expression.Constant(id);Di2015NewLine   var body = Expression.Equal(instanceId, compareId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return Expression.Lambda<Func<A, bool>>(body, x);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16926327Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ResultMapDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Add(int[] key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(key != null);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(key.Length > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var currentMap = _root;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var i in key.Take(key.Length - 1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object levelValue;Di2015NewLine            if (currentMap.TryGetValue(i, out levelValue))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                currentMap = levelValue as Dictionary<int, object>;Di2015NewLine                if (currentMap == null)Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("A rule is already defined for this key.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newMap = new Dictionary<int, object>();Di2015NewLine                currentMap.Add(i, newMap);Di2015NewLine                currentMap = newMap;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var leaf = key[key.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine        if (currentMap.ContainsKey(leaf))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("A rule is already defined for this key.");Di2015NewLine        currentMap.Add(leaf, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string TryGetValue(params int[] key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(key != null);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(key.Length > 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var currentMap = _root;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var i in key)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            object levelValue;Di2015NewLine            if (!currentMap.TryGetValue(i, out levelValue))Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine            currentMap = levelValue as Dictionary<int, object>;Di2015NewLine            if (currentMap == null)Di2015NewLine                return (string) levelValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<int, object> _root = new Dictionary<int, object>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16926327Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var resultMap = new ResultMap();Di2015NewLine        resultMap.Add(new[] {0}, "a0");Di2015NewLine        resultMap.Add(new[] {1, 0}, "b0");Di2015NewLine        resultMap.Add(new[] {1, 1, 0}, "c0");Di2015NewLine        resultMap.Add(new[] {1, 1, 1}, "c1");Di2015NewLine        resultMap.Add(new[] {1, 2}, "b2");Di2015NewLine        resultMap.Add(new[] {2}, "a2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 0, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 0, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 0, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 1, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 1, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 1, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 2, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 2, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(0, 2, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(null == resultMap.TryGetValue(1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(null == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 0, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 0, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 0, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("c0" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 1, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("c1" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 1, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(null == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 1, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 2, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 2, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("b2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(1, 2, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 0, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 0, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 0, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 1, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 1, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 1, 2));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 2, 0));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 2, 1));Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert("a2" == resultMap.TryGetValue(2, 2, 2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16928055Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable Union(DataTable First, DataTable Second, string strReturnedTableName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Result table.Di2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable(strReturnedTableName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Build new columns.Di2015NewLine    DataColumn[] newcolumns = new DataColumn[First.Columns.Count];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < First.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        newcolumns[i] = new DataColumn(First.Columns[i].ColumnName, First.Columns[i].DataType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add new columns to result table.Di2015NewLine    table.Columns.AddRange(newcolumns);Di2015NewLine    table.BeginLoadData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load data from first table.Di2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow row in First.Rows)Di2015NewLine        table.LoadDataRow(row.ItemArray, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Load data from second table.Di2015NewLine    foreach (DataRow row in Second.Rows)Di2015NewLine        table.LoadDataRow(row.ItemArray, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    table.EndLoadData();Di2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16928702Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<IList<int>> SplitValues(IList<int> input, int difference = 30)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> results = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    int last = input.First();Di2015NewLine    foreach(var value in input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value - last > difference)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return new[] {results.First(), results.Last()};Di2015NewLine            results = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        results.Add(value);Di2015NewLine        last = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return new[] {results.First(), results.Last()};Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
