16929859Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProductDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public decimal Fineness { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16929859Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Initializer : DropCreateDatabaseAlways<Context>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected override void Seed(Context context)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        // note how i am specifying it here as 4 digits after the decimal pointDi2015NewLine        // and for the second one, 3 digitsDi2015NewLine        // this is where EF precision must be configured so you can expectDi2015NewLine        // the values you tell EF to save to the dbDi2015NewLine        context.Products.Add(new Product() {Id = 1, Fineness = 145.2442m});Di2015NewLine        context.Products.Add(new Product() {Id = 2, Fineness = 12.341m});Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Context : DbContextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IDbSet<Product> Products { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Context()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // I always explicitliy define how my EF should run, but this is not needed for the answer i am providing youDi2015NewLine        Configuration.AutoDetectChangesEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine        Configuration.ProxyCreationEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine        Configuration.LazyLoadingEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine        Configuration.ValidateOnSaveEnabled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnModelCreating(DbModelBuilder modelBuilder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // so here, I am override the model configuration which is what Di2015NewLine        // EF can use in order to set-up the behaviour of how everything Di2015NewLine        // is configured in the database, from associations betweenDi2015NewLine        // multiple entities and property validation, Null-able, Precision, required fields etcDi2015NewLine        modelBuilder.Configurations.Add(new ProductConfiguration());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProductConfiguration : EntityTypeConfiguration<Product>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ProductConfiguration()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ToTable("Product");Di2015NewLine        HasKey(x => x.Id).Property(x => x.Id).HasDatabaseGeneratedOption(DatabaseGeneratedOption.Identity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // HAS PRECISION. Di2015NewLine        // Enforces how the value is to be stored in the databaseDi2015NewLine        // Here you can see I set a scale of 3, that's 3 digits afterDi2015NewLine        // the decimal. Notice how in my seed method, i gave a product 4 digits!Di2015NewLine        // That means it will NOT save the product with the other trailing digits.Di2015NewLine        Property(x => x.Fineness).HasPrecision(precision: 10, scale: 3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16929859Di2015UniqueSeparator[TestFixture]Di2015NewLinepublic class TestsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Test]Di2015NewLine    public void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Database.SetInitializer(new Initializer());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var ctx = new Context())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // assert our findings that it is indeed not what we actually specified in the seed method, because of our Entity configuration with HasPrecision.Di2015NewLine            Product product1 = ctx.Products.Find(1);Di2015NewLine            Assert.AreEqual(145.244m, product1.Fineness);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Product product2 = ctx.Products.Find(2);Di2015NewLine            Assert.AreEqual(12.341m, product2.Fineness);Di2015NewLine        }         Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16930605Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>A simple frame-based game engine.</summary>Di2015NewLineinterface IGameEngineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Proceed to next frame.</summary>Di2015NewLine    void NextFrame();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Await this to schedule action.</summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="framesToWait">Number of frames to wait.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Awaitable task.</returns>Di2015NewLine    Task Wait(int framesToWait);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16930605Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ScriptsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static async void AttackPlayer(IGameEngine g)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await g.Wait(60);Di2015NewLine        while(true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            await DoSomeLogic(g);Di2015NewLine            await g.Wait(30);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static async Task DoSomeLogic(IGameEngine g)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SomethingHappening();Di2015NewLine        await g.Wait(10);Di2015NewLine        SomethingElseHappens();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void ShootAtPlayer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Pew Pew!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SomethingHappening()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Something happening!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SomethingElseHappens()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("SomethingElseHappens!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16930605Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IGameEngine engine = new GameEngine();Di2015NewLine    Scripts.AttackPlayer(engine);Di2015NewLine    while(true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        engine.NextFrame();Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(100);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
16930605Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask
16930605Di2015UniqueSeparatorTaskCompletionSource<T>
16930605Di2015UniqueSeparatorTaskCompletionSource<object>
16930605Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass GameEngine : IGameEngineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int _frameCounter;Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<int, TaskCompletionSource<object>> _scheduledActions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GameEngine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _scheduledActions = new Dictionary<int, TaskCompletionSource<object>>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void NextFrame()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(_frameCounter == int.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _frameCounter = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++_frameCounter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        TaskCompletionSource<object> completionSource;Di2015NewLine        if(_scheduledActions.TryGetValue(_frameCounter, out completionSource))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0}: Current frame: {1}",Di2015NewLine                Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, _frameCounter);Di2015NewLine            _scheduledActions.Remove(_frameCounter);Di2015NewLine            completionSource.SetResult(null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0}: Current frame: {1}, no events.",Di2015NewLine                Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, _frameCounter);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Task Wait(int framesToWait)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(framesToWait < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("framesToWait", "Should be non-negative.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(framesToWait == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Task.FromResult<object>(null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        long scheduledFrame = (long)_frameCounter + (long)framesToWait;Di2015NewLine        if(scheduledFrame > int.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            scheduledFrame -= int.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        TaskCompletionSource<object> completionSource;Di2015NewLine        if(!_scheduledActions.TryGetValue((int)scheduledFrame, out completionSource))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            completionSource = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLine            _scheduledActions.Add((int)scheduledFrame, completionSource);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return completionSource.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16935571Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate SmartcardErrorCode GetUID(ref byte[] UID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] receivedUID = new byte[10];Di2015NewLine        UnsafeNativeMethods.SCARD_IO_REQUEST request = new UnsafeNativeMethods.SCARD_IO_REQUEST();Di2015NewLine        request.dwProtocol = 1; //SCARD_PROTOCOL_T1);Di2015NewLine        request.cbPciLength =    System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(UnsafeNativeMethods.SCARD_IO_REQUEST));Di2015NewLine        byte[] sendBytes = new byte[] { 0xFF, 0xCA, 0x00, 0x00, 0x04 }; //get UID command      for Mifare cardsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int outBytes = receivedUID.Length;Di2015NewLine        int status = SCardTransmit(_hCard, ref request, ref sendBytes[0], sendBytes.Length,  ref request, ref receivedUID[0], ref outBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        UID = receivedUID.Take(8).ToArray(); Di2015NewLine        return status;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16942385Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetNetworkUsage(System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface[] nis)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (NetworkInterface ni in nis)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                float bandwidth = ni.Speed;Di2015NewLine                const int numberOfIterations = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                float sendSum = 0;Di2015NewLine                float receiveSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                float lastRec = ni.GetIPv4Statistics().BytesReceived;Di2015NewLine                float lastSent = ni.GetIPv4Statistics().BytesSent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int index = 0; index < numberOfIterations; index++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(10);Di2015NewLine                    float br = ni.GetIPv4Statistics().BytesReceived;Di2015NewLine                    float bs = ni.GetIPv4Statistics().BytesSent;Di2015NewLine                    receiveSum += br - lastRec;Di2015NewLine                    sendSum += bs - lastSent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    lastRec = br;Di2015NewLine                    lastSent = bs;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                float dataSent = sendSum;Di2015NewLine                float dataReceived = receiveSum;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                double dout = (((8 * (dataSent)) / (bandwidth) * 100) * 1024) / 100;Di2015NewLine                double din = (((8 * (dataReceived)) / (bandwidth) * 100) * 1024) / 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dout = Math.Round(dout, 2);Di2015NewLine                din = Math.Round(din, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string doutround = Convert.ToString(dout);Di2015NewLine                string dinround = Convert.ToString(din);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                String output = dinround + "/" + doutround;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                GlobalsWMI.NetIOs.Add(output);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            String tooutput = String.Join("AND", GlobalsWMI.NetIOs);Di2015NewLine            GlobalsWMI.NetIOs.Clear();Di2015NewLine            return tooutput;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

16942390Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<string> strings = new[] { "1", "2", "3", "10", "20", "30", "Dog", "Cat", "30Dog", "30Cat" };Di2015NewLine        strings = strings.OrderBy(s => s, new CustomComparer());Di2015NewLine        var joined = string.Join(" ", strings);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(joined);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class CustomComparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Compare(string s1, string s2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int x, y;Di2015NewLine            bool xInt, yInt;Di2015NewLine            xInt = int.TryParse(s1, out x);Di2015NewLine            yInt = int.TryParse(s2, out y);Di2015NewLine            if (xInt && yInt)Di2015NewLine                return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine            if (xInt && !yInt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.SplitInt(s2, out y, out s2))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return x.CompareTo(y);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return -1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!xInt && yInt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.SplitInt(s1, out x, out s1))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return y.CompareTo(x);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return s1.CompareTo(s2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool SplitInt(string sin, out int x, out string sout)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            x = 0;Di2015NewLine            sout = null;Di2015NewLine            int i = -1;                Di2015NewLine            bool isNumeric = false;Di2015NewLine            var numbers = Enumerable.Range(0, 10).Select(it => it.ToString());Di2015NewLine            var ie = sin.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine            while (ie.MoveNext() && numbers.Contains(ie.Current.ToString()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                isNumeric |= true;Di2015NewLine                ++i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (isNumeric)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sout = sin.Substring(i + 1);Di2015NewLine                sin = sin.Substring(0, i + 1);Di2015NewLine                int.TryParse(sin, out x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

16942499Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ExifRemoverDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class JpegPatcherDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Stream PatchAwayExif(Stream inStream, Stream outStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] jpegHeader = new byte[2];Di2015NewLine            jpegHeader[0] = (byte)inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            jpegHeader[1] = (byte)inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            if (jpegHeader[0] == 0xff && jpegHeader[1] == 0xd8) //check if it's a jpeg fileDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SkipAppHeaderSection(inStream);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            outStream.WriteByte(0xff);Di2015NewLine            outStream.WriteByte(0xd8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int readCount;Di2015NewLine            byte[] readBuffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine            while ((readCount = inStream.Read(readBuffer, 0, readBuffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                outStream.Write(readBuffer, 0, readCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return outStream;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void SkipAppHeaderSection(Stream inStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] header = new byte[2];Di2015NewLine            header[0] = (byte)inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            header[1] = (byte)inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (header[0] == 0xff && (header[1] >= 0xe0 && header[1] <= 0xef))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int exifLength = inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine                exifLength = exifLength << 8;Di2015NewLine                exifLength |= inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < exifLength - 2; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                header[0] = (byte)inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine                header[1] = (byte)inStream.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            inStream.Position -= 2; //skip back two bytesDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
